Steam (ST): ...I've managed to get this far by plausibly dashing away in a rage.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I think dashing away in a rage got me here without raising too much suspicion.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I've managed to get this far by believably dashing away in a rage.
PC Japanese (JP): ……怒って飛び出すという、自然な流れでここまで来られたと思う。
Russian (RU): ......Я здесь потому, что правдоподобно умчалась в ярости.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ter ficado irritada e saído correndo até aqui deve ter levantado muitas suspeitas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……勃然大怒地衝出客廳，我想我應該表現得很自然。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……勃然大怒地冲出客厅，我想我应该表现得很自然。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sono riuscita ad arrivare fin qui scappando via credibilmente infuriata.

Steam (ST): So far, ...everything has gone well.
Umineko Project (UP): So far......everything has gone well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So far......everything has gone well.
PC Japanese (JP): ここまでは、……まずは順調だった。
Russian (RU): Пока...... всё продвигается гладко.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas até aqui......tudo está correndo bem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 到此為止，……還算順利。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 到此为止，……还算顺利。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fin qui... tutto è andato bene.

Steam (ST): Before my eyes was the doorknob of the specified guest room. ...However, ...I wonder if it's locked.
Umineko Project (UP): Before my eyes was the doorknob of the specified guest room.{n}......However, ...I wondered about the lock.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Before my eyes was the doorknob of the specified guest room.......However, ...I wonder if it's locked.
PC Japanese (JP): 目の前には、指定された客室のドアノブがある。……しかし、…鍵はどうなっているだろうか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 目の前には、指定された客室のドアノブがある。{n}……しかし、…鍵はどうなっているだろうか。
Russian (RU): У меня перед глазами была дверная ручка указанной гостевой комнаты.{n}......Но... вдруг дверь заперта.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Diante dos meus olhos estava a maçaneta de um quarto de hóspedes específico.{n}......Porém, ...me pergunto sobre a tranca.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 眼前是，指定我去的客房的門把手。{n}……可是，…有沒有上鎖呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 眼前是，指定我去的客房的门把手。{n}……可是，…有没有上锁呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Davanti ai miei occhi c'era il pomello della porta della stanza specifica. ... Tuttavia... mi chiedo se sia chiusa.

Steam (ST): The servants are normally ordered to lock any unused rooms.
Umineko Project (UP): The servants are under orders to always lock any unused rooms.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The servants are normally ordered to lock any unused rooms.
PC Japanese (JP): 使っていない部屋には鍵を掛けておくよう、普段から使用人たちに命じてある。
Russian (RU): Слугам приказано запирать все неиспользуемые комнаты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os serviçais foram ordenados a sempre manterem quartos vagos trancados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 平時命令過傭人，不用的房間需上鎖。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 平时命令过佣人，不用的房间需上锁。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Normalmente viene ordinato ai domestici di chiudere qualsiasi stanza non usata.

Steam (ST): ...What will I do if it's locked...?
Umineko Project (UP): ......What will I do if it's locked...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......What will I do if it's locked...?
PC Japanese (JP): ……もし、施錠されていたらどうしよう…？
Russian (RU): ......Что делать, если там заперто?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O que eu faço se estiver trancado...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……如果鎖著該怎麼辦…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……如果锁着该怎么办…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Cosa farò se è chiusa...?

Steam (ST): I had dashed away from the others, pretending I was returning to my room.
Umineko Project (UP): I dashed out of the parlor pretending that I was returning to my room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I dashed out pretending that I was returning to my room.
PC Japanese (JP): 自室へ戻るというフリをして飛び出したのだ。
Russian (RU): Я убежала, сделав вид, что возвращаюсь в свою комнату.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu sai correndo da sala de visitas fingindo que iria retornar ao meu quarto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我假裝要回自己房間地衝出了客廳。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我假装要回自己房间地冲出了客厅。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono scappata via dicendo che stavo tornando alla mia stanza.

Steam (ST): Popping back and asking a servant to unlock this guest room would be obviously suspicious...
Umineko Project (UP): Going back and asking a servant to unlock this guest room would be obviously suspicious...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Popping back and asking a servant to unlock this guest room would be obviously suspicious...
PC Japanese (JP): のこのこと戻り、この客室の鍵を開けろと使用人に頼むのは、どう見ても不審なことだ…。
Russian (RU): Бросаться обратно и просить слуг отпереть эту гостевую комнату будет явно подозрительно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Voltar agora e pedir para um serviçal destrancar este quarto de hóspedes geraria muitas suspeitas...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 厚著臉皮回去，拜託傭人打開這間客房的門鎖，怎麼看都不自然…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 厚着脸皮回去，拜托佣人打开这间客房的门锁，怎么看都不自然…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Passare di nuovo e chiedere a un domestico di aprire questa stanza degli ospiti sarebbe ovviamente sospetto...

Steam (ST): If I can, ...I'd like to get this eerie hide-and-seek over with without anyone noticing.
Umineko Project (UP): If possible, ......I'd like to get this eerie hide‐and‐seek over with without anyone noticing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I can, ......I'd like to get this eerie hide-and-seek over with without anyone noticing.
PC Japanese (JP): 出来れば、……この不気味な隠れん坊の真似事は、誰にも気付かれたくない。
Russian (RU): Если возможно...... я бы хотела, чтобы эти жуткие прятки никто не заметил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se possível, ......eu gostaria de passar por esse esconde‐esconde macabro sem que ninguém percebesse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果能做到的話，……我希望誰都別發覺，這場令人心裡發毛的捉迷藏。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果能做到的话，……我希望谁都别发觉，这场令人心里发毛的捉迷藏。

Steam (ST): In that phone call from the one who claimed to be the man from 19 years ago, he said I would win if no one found out, but lose if anyone did find out.
Umineko Project (UP): In that phone call from the one who claimed to be a man from 19 years ago, he said that I would win if no one found me, but lose if anyone did find me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that phone call from the one who claimed to be the man from 19 years ago, he said that I would win if no one found out, but lose if anyone did find out.
PC Japanese (JP): あの１９年前の男を名乗る電話は、誰にも見つからなかったら勝ち、見つかったら負け、と言っていた。
Russian (RU): Когда позвонил тот, кто представился человеком из 19‐летней давности, он сказал, что я выиграю, если никто не узнает, но проиграю, если кто‐то узнает.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No telefonema que recebi do suposto homem de 19 anos atrás, ele disse que eu venceria se ninguém me encontrasse, mas perderia se fosse encontrada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那個自稱 19 年前的男人的人，在電話裡說了，沒被任何人找著就算贏，被找著了就算輸。

Steam (ST): He said my husband would be released whether I won or lost, ...but as a person with a hostage taken against me, I'd rather not lose...
Umineko Project (UP): He said that he'd release my husband whether I won or lost, ......but as a person with a hostage taken against me, I'd rather not lose...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He said that my husband would be released whether I won or lost, ......but as a person with a hostage taken against me, I'd rather not lose...

Russian (RU): Он сказал, что освободит моего мужа независимо от того, проиграю я или нет...... но у него заложник, поэтому лучше не проигрывать...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele disse que iria soltar meu marido independente de eu vencer ou perder, ......mas como ele pode usar um refém para me ameaçar, é melhor que eu não perca...

Umineko Project (UP): Did Shannon or Kumasawa forget to lock it after cleaning?

Umineko Project (UP): That man......couldn't be waiting for me in this room, could he?

PC Japanese (JP): この部屋の中に、……まさか、あの男が待ち受けているとか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この部屋の中に、……まさか、あの男が待ち受けているとか。
Russian (RU): Он же...... не ждёт меня в этой комнате?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquele homem......não poderia estar esperando aqui dentro, ou poderia?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 難道說，……那個男的，就等在這房間裡嗎？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 难道说，……那个男的，就等在这房间里吗？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quell'uomo... non mi starà aspettando in questa stanza, vero?
E dopo... lui ...

Steam (ST): All that about hide-and-seek might have been a mere excuse.
Umineko Project (UP): All that about hide‐and‐seek might have been just an excuse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): All that about hide-and-seek might have been just an excuse.
PC Japanese (JP): 隠れん坊なんて所詮は口実かもしれない。
Russian (RU): Все эти прятки могут быть лишь поводом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Toda essa história de esconde‐esconde poderia ser só uma desculpa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 捉迷藏，可能只是個藉口。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 捉迷藏，可能只是个借口。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tutto quel discorso sul nascondino potrebbe essere solo una scusa.

Steam (ST): I kept the fact I was coming here secret, and all the others think I'm resting in my room.
Umineko Project (UP): I kept the fact that I was coming here secret, and all of the other people think I'm resting in my room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I kept the fact that I was coming here secret, and all of the other people think I'm resting in my room.
PC Japanese (JP): 誰にも内緒でここに来た私は、他の人間からは今、自室で休んでいると思われている。
Russian (RU): Я втайне пришла сюда, пока все остальные думают, что я отдыхаю в своей комнате.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu mantive minha vinda até aqui em segredo, e todos acham que estou descansando no meu quarto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 瞞著所有人來到這個房間的我，在其他人的印象中，此刻正在自己房間裡休息。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 瞒着所有人来到这个房间的我，在其他人的印象中，此刻正在自己房间里休息。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ho tenuto segreto il fatto che stessi venendo qui, e tutte le altre persone pensano che io stia riposando nella mia stanza.

Steam (ST): If I were to be killed in this situation, ...it might create a new baffling murder case, like an extension of the one that occurred this morning.
Umineko Project (UP): If I were to be killed in this situation, in this room, ......it might create a new baffling murder case, like an extension of the one which occurred this morning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I were to be killed in this situation, ......it might create a new baffling murder case, like an extension of the one which occurred this morning.
PC Japanese (JP): この状況で、私がこの部屋で殺されたなら、……早朝の不可解な殺人事件を延長するような、新しい不可解事件を構築してしまうかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Если меня убьют в такой ситуации...... возникнет новое непонятное дело об убийстве, которое расширит утреннее преступление.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu estiver para ser morta agora, neste quarto, ......isso pode acabar criando um novo caso de assassinato incompreensível, como se fosse uma continuação do que aconteceu no período da manhã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這個狀況下，我於這個房間被殺的話，……就也許會，恰似凌晨不可解的殺人事件的延續般，構築起新的不可解的事件。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这个状况下，我于这个房间被杀的话，……就也许会，恰似凌晨不可解的杀人事件的延续般，构筑起新的不可解的事件。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se venissi uccisa in questa situazione... potrebbe creare un nuovo sconcertante caso di omicidio, come un estensione di quello che è avvenuto questa mattina.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "......Th-That might actually turn out for the better. ...Perhaps this is a good chance to confront the culprit directly..."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........I‐...if that's what he's up to, so much the better. ...It will be a good chance to confront the culprit directly..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Th, ...that's just great. ...Perhaps this is a good chance to confront the culprit directly..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………そ、…そうならば、むしろ好都合です。…犯人と直接対決する良い機会ではありませんか…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………そ、…そうならば、むしろ好都合です。…犯人と直接対決する良い機会ではありませんか…」
Russian (RU): ".........Ка... как удобно. Хорошая возможность лично расквитаться с преступником..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........S‐...Se é isso o que ele espera, então seria ainda melhor. ...Será uma boa oportunidade de confrontar o culpado diretamente..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………若、…若是如此的話，反倒正好。…這不正是，與犯人直接對決的好機會嘛…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………若、…若是如此的话，反倒正好。…这不正是，与犯人直接对决的好机会嘛…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... È... È semplicemente fantastico. ... Forse questa è una buona occasione per affrontare il colpevole direttamente..."

Steam (ST): Natsuhi had some experience with using a naginata, though only casually.
Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi had some experience with using a {ruby:Japanese polearm:naginata}, but only from casual lessons.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Natsuhi had some experience with using a naginata, but only casually.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃には薙刀の経験があるが、あくまでも習い事としてだ。
Russian (RU): У Нацухи был опыт обращения с {ruby:японское копьё:нагинатой}, но лишь поверхностный.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Natsuhi possuía certa experiência usando {i:naginata}, mas apenas o básico que aprendeu durante algumas aulas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃雖會點薙刀功夫，但那終究只不過是學過而已。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃虽会点薙刀功夫，但那终究只不过是学过而已。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Natsuhi aveva dell'esperienza nell'usare una naginata, ma solo di tanto in tanto.

Steam (ST): Unlike Eva, she couldn't brag about being able to hold off any single ruffian indefinitely.
Umineko Project (UP): Unlike Eva, she couldn't brag about being able to hold off any single ruffian indefinitely.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Unlike Eva, she couldn't brag about being able to hold off any single ruffian indefinitely.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽のように、暴漢の一人くらいいつでも撃退してやると豪語できるようなものではない。
Russian (RU): В отличие от Евы, она не могла похвастаться умением быстро избавиться от хулиганов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Diferente de Eva, ela não podia se gabar de ser capaz de imobilizar algum rufião por tempo indeterminado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 沒法像繪羽那樣誇口，就一個歹徒的話，老娘隨時都能將其打跑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 没法像绘羽那样夸口，就一个歹徒的话，老娘随时都能将其打跑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A differenza di Eva che poteva vantarsi di essere in grado di respingere un qualsiasi mascalzone indefinitivamente.

Steam (ST): As she was now, she had no realistic chance of challenging a man with malicious intent and winning.
Umineko Project (UP): As she was now, she had no realistic chance of prevailing over a man with malicious intent on her own, and no weapons that could make that possible.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As she was now, she had no realistic chance of challenging a man with malicious intent and winning.
PC Japanese (JP): 今の夏妃には、悪意ある男と一対一で対峙して、打ち勝てる武器も道理もなかった。
Russian (RU): Сейчас у неё не было реалистичного шанса бросить злоумышленнику вызов и победить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No momento, Natsuhi não possui nenhuma chance realística de prevalecer diante um homem com maliciosas intenções contra ela, muito menos uma arma capaz de derrotá‐lo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 現在的夏妃，要與有惡意的男子一對一地對峙，既沒有用來打的武器，也沒有打得贏的道理。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 现在的夏妃，要与有恶意的男子一对一地对峙，既没有用来打的武器，也没有打得赢的道理。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Da come era ora, non aveva nessuna realistica possibilità di affrontare un uomo con intenzioni maligne e vincere.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Russian (RU): [=OG]

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JPC]

Steam (ST): She readied herself...and slowly opened the door.
Umineko Project (UP): She readied herself......and slowly opened the door.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 意を決し、……ゆっくりと扉を開ける。
Russian (RU): Она подготовилась...... и медленно открыла дверь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela se preparou......e lentamente abriu a porta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃鐵了鐵心，……慢慢推開了門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃铁了铁心，……慢慢推开了门。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si preparò... e aprì lentamente la porta.

Steam (ST): She couldn't just stand around in the corridor and risk being seen by someone...
Umineko Project (UP): She couldn't afford to stand around in the corridor and risk being seen by someone...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She couldn't just stand around in the corridor and risk being seen by someone...
PC Japanese (JP): いつまでも廊下でぼんやりしていて、誰かに姿を見られるようなことがあってはならないのだ…。
Russian (RU): Ей нельзя было просто стоять в коридоре, рискуя быть замеченной...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela não podia assumir o risco de ficar parada no corredor e acabar sendo vista por alguém...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可不能老是站在走廊上發呆，被人瞧見自己的身影…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可不能老是站在走廊上发呆，被人瞧见自己的身影…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non poteva starsene lì nel corridoio e rischiare di essere vista da qualcuno...

Steam (ST): The atmosphere inside the guest room...was frigid, and she could sense no trace of anyone waiting impatiently for her.
Umineko Project (UP): The atmosphere inside the guest room......was ice‐cold, and she could sense no trace of a person waiting impatiently for her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The atmosphere inside the guest room......was ice-cold, and she could sense no trace of a person waiting impatiently for her.
PC Japanese (JP): 客室内の空気は、……冷え切っていて、誰かが自分を待ち侘びている、という気配はまったくなかった。
Russian (RU): Атмосфера в гостевой комнате...... была ледяной, и она не чувствовала никаких признаков присутствия человека, нетерпеливо ожидающего её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A atmosfera dentro do quarto de hóspedes......era fria como gelo, e ela não pôde sentir qualquer indício de uma pessoa esperando pacientemente por ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 客房內的空氣，……涼透了，毫無有誰等了自己許久的跡象。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 客房内的空气，……凉透了，毫无有谁等了自己许久的迹象。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'atmosfera all'interno della stanza degli ospiti... era gelida, e non riusciva a percepire nessuna traccia di una persona che la aspettava impazientemente.

Steam (ST): All she could hear were the unsettling sounds of the wind and rain.
Umineko Project (UP): All she could hear were the unsettling sounds of the wind and rain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): All she could hear were the unsettling sounds of the wind and rain.
PC Japanese (JP): 聞こえるのは、薄気味悪い風雨の音だけ。
Russian (RU): Был слышен только тревожный шум ветра и дождя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tudo o que ela podia ouvir era o inquietante som do vento e da chuva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 傳入耳中的，僅為陰森森的風雨之聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 传入耳中的，仅为阴森森的风雨之声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tutto quello che riusciva a sentire erano gli inquietanti suoni del vento e della pioggia.

Steam (ST): At first, this seemed to prove that there was no one here to threaten her, ...but soon, it only made an uneasy feeling rise up inside her even more strongly than before...
Umineko Project (UP): At first, that seemed to be proof that no one existed to threaten her, ......but before long, it only stirred up the uneasy feeling inside her all the more...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At first, that seemed to be proof that no one existed to threaten her, ......but soon, it only made an uneasy feeling rise up inside her even more strongly than before...
PC Japanese (JP): それは最初こそ、彼女を脅かす何者も存在しないことの証だったが、……すぐに、不安な気持ちを、さらに掻き立てるだけのものになるのだった…。
Russian (RU): Сначала она посчитала это доказательством, что там нет никого, кто бы стал угрожать ей...... но вскоре ей только больше стало не по себе...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De relance, não pareceu haver provas de que uma ameaça a sua vida existia ali, ......mas depois de certo tempo, isso apenas agitou ainda mais o seu sentimento de desconforto...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然一開始，這是脅迫她的某人並不在房中的證據，……但它馬上就轉變為，只是在變本加厲地煽動著夏妃的不安…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然一开始，这是胁迫她的某人并不在房中的证据，……但它马上就转变为，只是在变本加厉地煽动着夏妃的不安…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): All'inizio, sembrava essere la prova che non esisteva nessuno a minacciarla... ma presto, fece solo salire dentro di lei un'inquietante sensazione anche più fortemente di prima...

Steam (ST): The closet was just off to the side of anyone entering the room.
Umineko Project (UP): The closet was just off to the side of anyone entering the room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The closet was just off to the side of anyone entering the room.
PC Japanese (JP): クローゼットは、客室に入ってすぐの脇にある。
Russian (RU): Шкаф стоял в нескольких шагах от двери.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O armário ficava bem ao lado de quem entra no quarto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 壁櫥在客房門口的旁邊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 壁橱在客房门口的旁边。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'armadio era proprio accanto al fianco di chiunque entrasse nella stanza.

Steam (ST): Lined up inside it was a set of hangers for coats.
Umineko Project (UP): Lined up inside it was a set of hangers where guests could hang their coats.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Lined up inside it was a set of hangers for hanging coats on.
PC Japanese (JP): 中にはハンガーが並べられ、外套を吊るせるようになっていた。
Russian (RU): Внутри висели вешалки для пальто.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Alinhados dentro deles um conjunto de cabides para que os hóspedes pudessem dependurar seus casacos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 裡面排著能用來掛外套的衣架。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 里面排着能用来挂外套的衣架。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): All'interno c'era una serie di grucce allineate per appendere i cappotti.

Steam (ST): This closet, which had nothing hanging in it, was large enough for even an adult to hide in...
Umineko Project (UP): This closet, which had nothing hanging in it, was large enough for even an adult to hide in...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This closet, which had nothing hanging in it, was large enough for even an adult to hide in...
PC Japanese (JP): 何も吊るされていないクローゼット内は、大人であっても充分に隠れるだけの広さがあった…。
Russian (RU): Шкаф, в котором ничего не висело, был настолько большим, что там мог бы спрятаться даже взрослый...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste armário, não havia nada pendurado, por isso era grande o suficiente para um adulto se esconder...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在什麼都沒掛的壁櫥裡，有著足夠一個大人藏在裡面的空間…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在什么都没挂的壁橱里，有着足够一个大人藏在里面的空间…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo armadio, in cui non c'era appeso nulla, era abbastanza largo per farci nascondere anche un adulto...

Steam (ST): She softly opened the closet. ...Of course, there was nothing inside.
Umineko Project (UP): She softly opened the closet. ......Of course, there was nothing inside.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She softly opened the closet.......Of course, there was nothing inside.
PC Japanese (JP): そっとクローゼットを開ける。……無論、中には何もない。
Russian (RU): Она тихо открыла его. ......Разумеется, внутри ничего не было.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela cuidadosamente abriu o armário. ......É claro, não havia nada dentro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 輕輕地打開壁櫥。……當然，裡面什麼都沒掛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 轻轻地打开壁橱。……当然，里面什么都没挂。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Aprì delicatamente l'armadio. ... Ovviamente, non c'era niente all'interno.

Steam (ST): She would have to hide quietly in here for an hour.
Umineko Project (UP): She would have to hide quietly in here for an hour.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She would have to hide quietly in here for an hour.
PC Japanese (JP): この中に１時間、息を潜めていなくてはならない。
Russian (RU): Ей придётся молча прятаться там час.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela teria que ficar em silêncio dentro dele por uma hora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而我將不得不在這裡面，壓低呼吸藏個一小時…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而我将不得不在这里面，压低呼吸藏个一小时…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si sarebbe dovuta nascondere silenziosamente qui dentro per un'ora.

Steam (ST): The room had a wooden floor, but something like a carpet had been laid in the closet.
Umineko Project (UP): The room had a wood floor, but something like a carpet had been laid in the closet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The room had a wood floor, but something like a carpet had been lain in the closet.
PC Japanese (JP): 部屋はフローリングだが、クローゼット内には絨毯のようなものが敷かれていた。
Russian (RU): В комнате был деревянный пол, а в шкафу лежало некое подобие коврика.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O quarto tinha piso de madeira, mas havia algo parecido com um tapete no chão do armário.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然房間地面是木質地板，但在壁櫥內，卻鋪著像是地毯的東西。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然房间地面是木质地板，但在壁橱内，却铺着像是地毯的东西。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La stanza aveva un pavimento di legno, ma qualcosa come un tappeto era stato steso nell'armadio.

Steam (ST): ...It seemed sitting down wouldn't be a problem.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It seemed that sitting down wouldn't be a problem.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……座ることくらいは出来そうだった。
Russian (RU): ......По‐видимому, сидеть там вполне возможно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ficar sentada não parecia ser um problema.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……看來，能在裡面坐著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……看来，能在里面坐着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sembrava che sedersi non sarebbe stato un problema.

Steam (ST): She had been sure someone would be waiting for her in this room or that a strange letter would be lying in the closet.
Umineko Project (UP): She had been sure that someone would be waiting for her in this room, or that a strange letter would be lying in the closet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had been sure someone would be waiting for her in this room or that a strange letter would be lying in the closet.
PC Japanese (JP): てっきり、この部屋で誰かが待ち受けているか、あるいはクローゼットの中に、怪しげな手紙でもあるのかと思っていた。
Russian (RU): Она была уверена, что в этой комнате её кто‐то ждёт или что в шкафу окажется странное письмо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela tinha certeza que alguém estaria esperando dentro do quarto, ou que alguma carta estranha estaria descansando dentro do armário.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我本以為，這個房間裡會有人等著我，又或者，在這壁櫥中，會放著詭異的信。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我本以为，这个房间里会有人等着我，又或者，在这壁橱中，会放着诡异的信。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era sicura che qualcuno l'avrebbe aspettata in questa stanza o che una strana lettera stesse giacendo nell'armadio.

Steam (ST): ...In the worst case, she had even imagined that her husband's corpse might be inside there.
Umineko Project (UP): ......She had even imagined the worst, that her husband's corpse might be inside.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......In the worst case, she had even imagined that her husband's corpse might be inside there.
PC Japanese (JP): ……最悪の想像として、夫の死体が入れられているのではないかとさえ思った。
Russian (RU): ......Ей даже казалось, что в худшем случае там может быть труп её мужа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ela havia até imaginado algo pior, imaginado que o cadáver de seu marido pudesse estar ali dentro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……作為最壞的預想，我甚至還想過，壁櫥裡會不會放著我丈夫的屍體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……作为最坏的预想，我甚至还想过，壁橱里会不会放着我丈夫的尸体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Nel peggiore dei casi, aveva addirittura immaginato che il corpo di suo marito potesse essere lì dentro.

Steam (ST): However, none of these things she imagined turned out to be true.
Umineko Project (UP): However, none of these things she imagined turned out to be true.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, none of these things she imagined turned out to be true.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、それらの想像は全て裏切られた。
Russian (RU): Однако ничто из того, что она воображала, не сбылось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, nenhuma das coisas que ela imaginou se concretizou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，這些想像全部落空了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，这些想象全部落空了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, nessuna delle cose che aveva immaginato si rivelarono vere.

Steam (ST): The only thing there was a cold guest room... and a lifeless closet that silently urged her to enter...
Umineko Project (UP): All that was here was a cold guest room...and a lifeless closet which silently urged her to go inside......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The only thing there was a cold guest room and a lifeless closet which was silently urging her to go inside......

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi

Umineko Project (UP): "............And he told me...to hide in here for an hour... ......He's making fun of me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........And he told me...to hide in here for an hour.........He's making fun of me."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………この中に、…１時間隠れていろというのですね…。……馬鹿にした話です」

Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi shrugged, turned around, then locked and chained the guest room door.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "This way, no one will be able to get into this room. ...In other words, no one will be able to find me for the next hour. I win. What a stupid game of hide-and-seek."
Umineko Project (UP): "This way, no one will be able to get into this room. ......In other words, no one will be able to find me for the next hour. I win. What a stupid game of hide‐and‐seek."

PC Japanese (JP): 「これで、この部屋には誰も入れないではありませんか。……つまり、１時間の間、誰にも私を見つけることは出来ない。私の勝ちです。……馬鹿馬鹿しい隠れん坊ですね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「これで、この部屋には誰も入れないではありませんか。……つまり、１時間の間、誰にも私を見つけることは出来ない。私の勝ちです。……馬鹿馬鹿しい隠れん坊ですね」
Russian (RU): "Так в эту комнату никто не войдёт. ......Иначе говоря, никто в течение часа меня не найдёт. Я победила. До чего глупые прятки."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Assim ninguém será capaz de entrar neste quarto. ......Em outras palavras, ninguém será capaz de me encontrar pela próxima hora. Eu venci. Que esconde‐esconde mais estúpido."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這麼一來，不就誰都進不了這個房間了嘛？……換言之就是，這一小時內，誰都找不到我。我贏了。……好傻的捉迷藏。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这么一来，不就谁都进不了这个房间了嘛？……换言之就是，这一小时内，谁都找不到我。我赢了。……好傻的捉迷藏。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "In questo modo, nessuno sarà in grado di entrare in questa stanza. ... In altre parole, nessuno sarà in grado di trovarmi per la prossima ora. Vinco io. {n}Che stupido nascondino."

Steam (ST): This surely must be a total victory in the hide-and-seek game against that mystery man.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso certamente vai resultar em uma vitória completa da minha parte neste jogo contra aquele homem misterioso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 的確，這麼一來，無疑能在與那位神秘男子玩的捉迷藏中大獲全勝。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sbloccai quelle due preziose serrature... entrai nell'armadio debolmente illuminato riempito con l'odore di legno antico, e riuscì a chiudere l'anta dall'interno.

Steam (ST): ...Pitch black.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Pitch black.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……真っ暗。
Russian (RU): ......Как темно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Escuridão total.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……一片漆黑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Buio pesto.

Steam (ST): It reminded me of when I was young, when I used to hide somewhere and then surprise my mother, but that peaceful recollection wasn't enough to kill off my anxiety.
Umineko Project (UP): It reminded me of when I was young, when I used to hide somewhere and then surprise my mother, but that peaceful recollection wasn't enough to kill off my anxiety.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It reminded me of when I was young, when I used to hide somewhere and then surprise my mother, but that peaceful recollection wasn't enough to kill off my anxiety.
PC Japanese (JP): 幼い頃に、母親を驚かすためにした隠れん坊の記憶が蘇るが、不安さを打ち消すのどかな回想にはならなかった。
Russian (RU): Я вспомнила, как в детстве пряталась и потом удивляла маму, но одно это мирное воспоминание не смогло убить мою тревогу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso me lembrou de quando eu era jovem e costumava me esconder para dar sustos na minha mãe, mas essa pacífica recordação não foi o bastante para acabar com a minha ansiedade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然腦中浮現出了，小時候為了嚇母親一跳而藏起來的記憶，但它未能成為足以抵消不安的溫馨回想。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然脑中浮现出了，小时候为了吓母亲一跳而藏起来的记忆，但它未能成为足以抵消不安的温馨回想。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mi fece ricordare di quando ero giovane, quando mi nascondevo abitualmente da qualche parte e dopo sorprendevo mia Madre, ma quel ricordo tranquillo non era abbastanza per eliminare la mia ansia.

Steam (ST): It really is pitch black.
Umineko Project (UP): It really is pitch black.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It really is pitch black.
PC Japanese (JP): 本当に真っ暗だった。
Russian (RU): Тут и вправду кромешная тьма.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Está completamente escuro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真的好黑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È veramente buio pesto.

Steam (ST): From here, I won't even be able to check my watch to see if an hour has passed.
Umineko Project (UP): From in here, I won't even be able to check my watch to see if an hour has passed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): From here, I won't even be able to check my watch to see if an hour has passed.
PC Japanese (JP): これでは１時間経ったかどうか、時計を確かめることも出来ない。
Russian (RU): Здесь я даже не смогу проверить время и посмотреть, прошёл ли час.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim eu sequer vou conseguir ver meu relógio para saber quando tiver passado uma hora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這裡面，連看表確認有沒有到一小時都做不到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这里面，连看表确认有没有到一小时都做不到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Da qui, non potrò neanche controllare il mio orologio per vedere se è passata un'ora.

Steam (ST): I'll probably need to open the door a crack every once in a while to let in enough light for my watch.
Umineko Project (UP): I'll probably need to open the door a crack every once in a while to let in enough light for my watch.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'll probably need to open the door a crack every once in a while to let in enough light for my watch.
PC Japanese (JP): 時折、隙間を開けて、その明かりで時計を見る必要があるだろう。
Russian (RU): Наверное, придётся время от времени открывать щёлочку, чтобы на мои часы падало достаточно света.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Provavelmente vou ter que abrir uma fresta na porta de vez em quando para deixar um pouco de luz entrar, e olhar a hora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來是有必要，時不時地開條縫，通過那一縷光來看下表吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来是有必要，时不时地开条缝，通过那一缕光来看下表吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Probabilmente avrò bisogno di aprire l'anta di uno spiraglio di tanto in tanto per un po' per fare entrare abbastanza luce per il mio orologio.

Steam (ST): ...For now, ...I'll crouch down here.
Umineko Project (UP): ......For now, .........I sat down and folded my legs.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......For now, ......I'll crouch down here.
PC Japanese (JP): ……とりあえず、………腰を下ろし、うずくまる。
Russian (RU): ......А пока...... сяду сюда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Por ora, .........eu sentei com as pernas dobradas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……我彎腰，………蹲坐了下去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……我弯腰，………蹲坐了下去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Per ora... mi accovaccerò qui.

Steam (ST): I thought about clutching my knees, but it hurt my back when I tried.
Umineko Project (UP): I thought about holding my knees to my chest, but it hurt my back when I tried.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I thought about clutching my knees, but it hurt my back when I tried.
PC Japanese (JP): 膝を抱こうかと思ったが、それをしようとすると背中が苦痛だった。
Russian (RU): Я подумала согнуть ноги в коленях, но почувствовала боль в спине, когда попыталась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu pensei em ficar segurando os joelhos junto ao meu peito, mas minhas costas doeram quando tentei.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖想抱膝，但一把手伸過去，就感到了後背很難受。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽想抱膝，但一把手伸过去，就感到了后背很难受。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pensai di stringere le mie ginocchia, ma quando provai fece male alla mia schiena.

Steam (ST): I'm not as young as I used to be.
Umineko Project (UP): I'm not as young as I used to be.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'm not as young as I used to be.
PC Japanese (JP): もうとっくに若くない。
Russian (RU): Я уже не так молода, как раньше.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não sou mais jovem como no passado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 早就不年輕了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 早就不年轻了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non sono più giovane come una volta.

Steam (ST): Even though I was made to sit on the floor holding my knees in every PE class as a grade schooler, I now have to struggle just to sit down.
Umineko Project (UP): Even though I and the rest of my class were made to sit on the floor clasping our knees in every PE class as grade schoolers, I now have to struggle just to sit down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though I was made to do a PE crouch in every PE class as a grade schooler, I now have to struggle just to sit down.
PC Japanese (JP): 小学生の頃は、体育の時間の度に体育座りをさせられたというのに、今では、腰一つ下ろすにも、体を騙している自分がいる。
Russian (RU): Хотя в школе на уроках физкультуры приходилось приседать постоянно, теперь я даже сесть могу с трудом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo sempre tendo sentado no chão enquanto segurava os joelhos durante as aulas de educação física, junto com todas as garotas da minha classe, agora eu sofro só para sentar normalmente no chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在小學生時，明明每到上體育課時，就會被要求抱膝坐地的，可現在，光是彎下腰，就是在勉強自己的身體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在小学生时，明明每到上体育课时，就会被要求抱膝坐地的，可现在，光是弯下腰，就是在勉强自己的身体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se mi si faceva fare un piegamento in ogni corso di educazione fisica da studentessa delle elementari, ora devo faticare solo per sedermi.

Steam (ST): Just crouching down here for an hour will probably hurt a lot...
Umineko Project (UP): Just sitting down here for an hour...will probably hurt a lot......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just crouching down here for an hour will probably hurt a lot......
PC Japanese (JP): こうして、ただうずくまって座っているだけの１時間でも、相当の苦痛になるだろう……。
Russian (RU): Просто сидеть здесь на корточках целый час будет трудно......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Só de ficar sentada aqui por uma hora...provavelmente já vai me deixar cheia de dores......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 僅僅是像這樣，蹲坐個一小時，都會相當難熬吧……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 仅仅是像这样，蹲坐个一小时，都会相当难熬吧……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Solo accovacciarsi qui per un'ora... probabilmente farà molto male...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): I can't believe......I'll be hiding in the darkness for a full hour, with nothing to hear except the wind and rain.
Umineko Project (UP): I can't believe.........he expects me to sit in the darkness for a full hour, listening only to the wind and the rain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I can't believe.........I'll be hiding in the darkness for a full hour, with nothing to hear except the wind and rain.
PC Japanese (JP): こうして、………暗闇で１時間も、ただ風雨だけを耳にしながら、息を潜めていろなんて。
Russian (RU): Поверить не могу......... Мне придётся прятаться в темноте целый час, не слыша ничего, кроме ветра и дождя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não consigo acreditar nisso.........ele espera que eu fique sentada na escuridão por uma hora, só ouvindo o barulho do vento e da chuva?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 居然要我像這樣，………只能聽到風雨聲地，在黑暗中壓低呼吸藏一個小時。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 居然要我像这样，………只能听到风雨声地，在黑暗中压低呼吸藏一个小时。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non riesco a credere... mi nasconderò per un'ora nell'oscurità, con niente da sentire eccetto il vento e la pioggia.

Steam (ST): Ironically, Natsuhi had made Jessica do the exact same thing in the past.
Umineko Project (UP): Ironically, Natsuhi had made Jessica do the exact same thing in the past.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Ironically, Natsuhi had made Jessica do the exact same thing in the past.
PC Japanese (JP): 皮肉にも、夏妃はまったく同じことを朱志香に強いたことがあった。
Russian (RU): Как ни странно, в прошлом Нацухи заставила Джессику сделать то же самое.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ironicamente, Natsuhi fez Jessica fazer exatamente a mesma coisa no passado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 諷刺的是，夏妃曾強逼朱志香做過完全一樣的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 讽刺的是，夏妃曾强逼朱志香做过完全一样的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ironicamente, Natsuhi fece fare a Jessica la stessa identica cosa in passato.

Steam (ST): She had done it when Jessica was a little girl, to scold her for her persistent bad habits and teach her a lesson.
Umineko Project (UP): She had done it to scold Jessica's persistent bad habits and teach her a lesson when she was a little girl.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had done it to scold Jessica's persistent bad habits and teach her a lesson when she was a little girl.
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香が幼少の頃、直らぬ悪い癖を叱り、その反省を促すためにだ。
Russian (RU): Чтобы наказать её за постоянные вредные привычки и преподать ей урок, когда та ещё была маленькой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela o fez para repreender Jessica por seu persistente mau comportamento e ensinar a ela uma lição na época em que Jessica ainda era pequena.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在朱志香小時候，夏妃曾訓斥其改不掉的壞毛病，為促使她反省而逼她受過這個罰。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在朱志香小时候，夏妃曾训斥其改不掉的坏毛病，为促使她反省而逼她受过这个罚。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lo fece per rimproverare le persistenti cattive abitudini di Jessica e per insegnarle una lezione quando era una ragazzina.

Steam (ST): She'd thought that making Jessica stay put in the darkness would sprout a desire to reflect on her mistakes... and that, this way, she would understand what she had done wrong.
Umineko Project (UP): She had thought that making Jessica stay put in the darkness would sprout a desire to reflect on her mistakes, and that, this way, she would understand what she had done wrong.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had thought that making Jessica stay put in the darkness would sprout a desire to reflect on her mistakes and that, this way, she would understand what she had done wrong.
PC Japanese (JP): 暗い中でじっとしていれば、自ずと自省の心が芽生え、自分の過ちを理解してくれるに違いないと思ってさせたことだった。
Russian (RU): Нацухи думала, что пребывание в темноте сможет пробудить в Джессике желание задуматься над своими ошибками, и таким образом она поймёт, что было сделано не так.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela pensou que fazer Jessica ficar no escuro pudesse fazer brotar nela um desejo de refletir sobre seus erros, e assim, dessa forma, ela entenderia o que fez de errado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當時是想著，只要一直待在黑暗中，她就肯定會自行萌發自省，明白自己的過錯了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当时是想着，只要一直待在黑暗中，她就肯定会自行萌发自省，明白自己的过错了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pensò che far stare Jessica nell'oscurità avrebbe dato origine al desiderio di riflettere sui propri errori e che, in questo modo, avrebbe capito cosa aveva fatto di sbagliato.

Steam (ST): ...It almost...feels like I'm being made to do the same thing.
Umineko Project (UP): ......To Natsuhi, it almost felt like......she was being made to do the same thing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......It almost......feels like I'm being made to do the same thing.
PC Japanese (JP): ……何だか、……自分が、そうさせられているような気持ちだった。
Russian (RU): ......Словно...... меня заставили сделать то же самое.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Para Natsuhi, era como se......ela estivesse fazendo o mesmo agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不由得感到，……自己是在被逼著反省了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不由得感到，……自己是在被逼着反省了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sembra quasi... come se mi si stia facendo fare la stessa cosa.

Steam (ST): If that's the true purpose of this hide-and-seek...
Umineko Project (UP): If that was the true purpose of this hide‐and‐seek......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If that's the true purpose of this hide-and-seek......
PC Japanese (JP): もしそれが、この隠れん坊の本当の目的なのだとしたら……。
Russian (RU): Если это и есть истинная цель этих пряток......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se esse era o verdadeiro propósito desse esconde‐esconde......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果這就是，這場捉迷藏的真正目的的話……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果这就是，这场捉迷藏的真正目的的话……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se quello è il vero obiettivo di questo nascondino...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi

Umineko Project (UP): "......How naive of me."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……甘えた考えです。」
Russian (RU): "......Какая я наивная."

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Com'è ingenuo da parte mia."

Steam (ST): This must be my naivety, the hope that if their goal is to make me repent, nothing will happen here during this hour...
Umineko Project (UP): This must be my naivety, the hope that if his goal is to make me repent, nothing will happen here during this hour...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This must be my naivety, the thought that if their goal is to make me repent, nothing will happen here during this hour...
PC Japanese (JP): 自省を促すのが目的なら、この１時間の間、きっと何も起こらないだろうと期待したい、心の甘えがそう思わせるに違いない…。
Russian (RU): Из‐за моей наивности мне кажется, что если его цель — заставить меня покаяться, за этот час ничего не произойдёт...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Só pode ser ingenuidade minha, a esperança de que o objetivo dele é fazer com que eu me arrependa, e nada irá acontecer durante essa uma hora...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一定是內心那份期望“如果目的是促使自省的話，那這一小時間一定什麼都不會發生”的天真，在致使自己這麼想…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一定是内心那份期望“如果目的是促使自省的话，那这一小时间一定什么都不会发生”的天真，在致使自己这么想…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa deve essere la mia ingenuità, il pensiero che il loro obiettivo sia quello di farmi pentire, non accadrà niente durante quest'ora...

Steam (ST): Uncertainty and fear of that man's shadow are not what I need right now.
Umineko Project (UP): Uncertainty and fear of that man's shadow are not what I need right now.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Uncertainty and fear of that man's shadow are not what I need right now.
PC Japanese (JP): 今の自分に必要なのは、不安とあの男の影に怯えることではない。
Russian (RU): Неопределённость и боязнь его тени сейчас не главное.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Incertezas e medo da sombra daquele homem não é o que eu preciso agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此刻自己所需要的，不是對那名男子的魔影的不安與畏懼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此刻自己所需要的，不是对那名男子的魔影的不安与畏惧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Incertezza e paura dell'ombra di quell'uomo non sono ciò di cui ho bisogno adesso.

Steam (ST): Will someone suddenly come to this room, open this closet, ...and do something horrible to me now that I've come here in total secrecy as promised?
Umineko Project (UP): Will someone suddenly come to this room, open this closet, ......and do something horrible to me now that I've come here in total secrecy as promised?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Will someone suddenly come to this room, open this closet, ......and do something horrible to me now that I've come here in total secrecy as promised?
PC Japanese (JP): 突然、この部屋にやってくるかもしれない何者かが、突然、このクローゼットを開け、……約束どおり、誰にも内緒でここへ来た私に、何かの危害を加えないかどうか。
Russian (RU): Вдруг кто‐нибудь зайдёт в эту комнату, откроет шкаф...... и сделает со мной нечто ужасное, когда я пришла сюда в полной секретности, как и обещала?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Será que alguém vai aparecer de repente, abrir este armário, ......e fazer algo terrível comigo agora que eu vim para cá em segredo, assim como eu havia prometido?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 會不會突然，有誰來到這個房間，突然，打開壁櫥，……向遵照約定，對所有人保密地來到此處的我，施加什麼傷害？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 会不会突然，有谁来到这个房间，突然，打开壁橱，……向遵照约定，对所有人保密地来到此处的我，施加什么伤害？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Qualcuno verrà improvvisamente in questa stanza, aprirà l'armadio... e mi farà qualcosa di orribile ora che sono venuta qui in totale segretezza come promesso?

Steam (ST): ...That's what I should be worrying about.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That's what I should be worrying about.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……むしろそれを心配すべきなのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Вот о чём мне следует беспокоиться.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不如說，這才是該擔心的事。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ecco ciò di cui dovrei preoccuparmi.

Steam (ST): The culprit, ...or one of his accomplices, is very close by. If they weren't, they wouldn't be able to observe me so thoroughly.
Umineko Project (UP): The culprit, ......or one of his accomplices, is very close by.{n}If they weren't, they wouldn't be able to observe me so thoroughly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The culprit, ......or one of his accomplices, is very close by. If they weren't, they wouldn't be able to observe me so thoroughly.
PC Japanese (JP): 犯人、……もしくはその協力者は、相当身近にいる。そうでなくては、私のことを監視など出来るわけがない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 犯人、……もしくはその協力者は、相当身近にいる。{n}そうでなくては、私のことを監視など出来るわけがない。
Russian (RU): Преступник...... или его сообщник очень близко.{n}Иначе он бы не смог так внимательно следить за мной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O culpado, ......ou um de seus cúmplices, deve estar muito próximo agora.{n}Se não estivessem, não seriam capazes de me observar daquela forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 犯人，……或其協助者，就在附近。{n}若非如此，就沒法監視我的行動。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 犯人，……或其协助者，就在附近。{n}若非如此，就没法监视我的行动。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il colpevole... o uno dei suoi complici, è molto vicino. Se non lo fossero, non potrebbero osservarmi così attentamente.

Steam (ST): I don't want to think it, but it's highly likely that the culprit bought off one of the servants.
Umineko Project (UP): I don't want to think it, but it's highly likely that the culprit bought off one of the servants.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I don't want to think it, but it's highly likely that the culprit bought off one of the servants.
PC Japanese (JP): 考えたくはないが、使用人の誰かが犯人に買収されている可能性が高い。
Russian (RU): Не хочется об этом думать, но вполне возможно, что преступник подкупил кого‐то из слуг.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não quero pensar nisso, mas é muito provável que o culpado subornou um dos serviçais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖不願這麼想，但某個傭人被犯人收買了的可能性非常高。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽不愿这么想，但某个佣人被犯人收买了的可能性非常高。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non voglio pensarci, ma è estremamente probabile che il colpevole abbia corrotto uno dei domestici.

Steam (ST): The culprit hid an eerie card with autumn written on it in my room.
Umineko Project (UP): The culprit was able to hide an eerie card with "autumn" written on it in my room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The culprit hid an eerie card with Fall written on it in my room.
PC Japanese (JP): 犯人は私の部屋に、秋などと書いた不気味なカードを潜ませてみせたのだ。
Russian (RU): Он спрятал в моей комнате жуткую карту с надписью 'Осень'.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O culpado foi capaz de esconder uma carta macabra escrito "outono" dentro do meu quarto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟，犯人可是做到了，把寫有秋字的滲人卡片放進了我的房間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟，犯人可是做到了，把写有秋字的渗人卡片放进了我的房间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il colpevole ha nascosto una carta inquietante nella mia stanza con su scritto Autunno.

Steam (ST): My personal room is always locked. That trick wouldn't have been possible without a key.
Umineko Project (UP): My personal room is always locked.{n}That trick wouldn't have been possible without a key.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): My personal room is always locked. That trick wouldn't have been possible without a key.
PC Japanese (JP): 自室は常に施錠している。鍵がなければあのような細工は不可能だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 自室は常に施錠している。{n}鍵がなければあのような細工は不可能だ。
Russian (RU): Моя личная комната всегда заперта.{n}Такой трюк невозможен без ключа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Meu quarto pessoal está sempre trancado.{n}Aquele truque não seria possível sem a chave.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我的房間，一直都是鎖著的。{n}沒鑰匙絕對搞不出那種花招。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的房间，一直都是锁着的。{n}没钥匙绝对搞不出那种花招。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La mia stanza personale è sempre chiusa. Quel trucco non sarebbe stato possibile senza una chiave.

Steam (ST): Instead of believing that they obtained the key when the servants weren't looking, it's much more realistic to assume that one of the servants lent the culprit a hand...
Umineko Project (UP): Instead of believing that they obtained the key when the servants weren't looking, it's much more realistic to assume that one of the servants lent the culprit a hand...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Instead of believing that they obtained the key when the servants weren't looking, it's much more realistic to assume that one of the servants lent the culprit a hand...
PC Japanese (JP): 使用人たちの目を盗み、鍵を手に入れたに違いないと考えるよりは、使用人の誰かが犯人に手を貸していると考える方が、ずっと現実的だ…。
Russian (RU): Вместо того, чтобы полагать, что ключ украли, пока слуги не видели, разумнее предположить, что кто‐то из слуг одолжил его преступнику...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ao invés de acreditar que ele obteve a chave quando os serviçais estavam distraídos, é muito mais realista supor que um dos serviçais ajudou o culpado...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與其認為，犯人肯定是趁傭人們不備偷到了鑰匙，還是按某個傭人在協助犯人來想，要現實得多…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与其认为，犯人肯定是趁佣人们不备偷到了钥匙，还是按某个佣人在协助犯人来想，要现实得多…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Invece di credere che abbiano ottenuto la chiave quando i domestici non stavano guardando, è molto più realistico assumere che uno dei domestici ha dato una mano al colpevole...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "But, ......h-how... ...did they know that autumn is my favorite season......? How unsettling......"
Umineko Project (UP): "Still, .........h‐how.........did they know that autumn is my favorite season.........? .........How ghastly........."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "But, .........wh, why............did they know that Fall is my favorite season.........? It's creepy........."
PC Japanese (JP): 「しかし、………ど、どうして、………私の好きな季節が秋だと………。………気持ちが悪い………。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「しかし、………ど、どうして、………私の好きな季節が秋だと………。………気持ちが悪い………」
Russian (RU): "Но............ к‐как......... он узнал, что моё любимое время года — осень?.. Ужас какой........."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mesmo assim, .........c‐como.........eles sabiam que o outono era a minha estação favorita.........? .........É perturbador........."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「可是，………為、為什麼，………會知道我喜歡的季節是秋天………？………好噁心………」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「可是，………为、为什么，………会知道我喜欢的季节是秋天………？………好恶心………」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ma... p-perché... sapeva che l'autunno era la mia stagione preferita...? {n}È raccapricciante..."

Steam (ST): The thought that this mystery man might be peeking into my heart sent goosebumps running across my whole body...
Umineko Project (UP): The thought that this mystery man might be peeking into my heart sent goosebumps running across my whole body...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 謎の男に、心の中まで覗かれているようで、全身に鳥肌が立つのを覚える…。
Russian (RU): От мысли, что этот таинственный человек смог заглянуть мне в душу, по всему телу побежали мурашки...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O pensamento de que esse homem misterioso possa estar observando o interior do meu coração faz com que calafrios corram por todo o meu corpo...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 簡直像是被那名神秘男子窺視了內心似的，全身不禁起了雞皮疙瘩…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 简直像是被那名神秘男子窥视了内心似的，全身不禁起了鸡皮疙瘩…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il pensiero che questo uomo misterioso potesse frugare nel mio cuore mi fece venire la pelle d'oca su tutto il mio corpo...

Steam (ST): It's true that I like autumn, but I've never said it out loud. I don't think anyone's ever heard me say it.
Umineko Project (UP): It's true that I like autumn, but I've never said that out loud.{n}I don't think anyone's ever asked me, either.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It's true that I like Fall, but I don't say that out loud. I don't think anyone's ever heard me say it.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は確かに秋を好むが、それを口に出したことはない。人に聞かれたことだってないはずだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私は確かに秋を好むが、それを口に出したことはない。{n}人に聞かれたことだってないはずだ。
Russian (RU): Да, мне нравится осень, но я не говорила об этом.{n}Не думаю, что кто‐то слышал это от меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É verdade que eu gosto do outono, mas eu nunca disse isso em voz alta.{n}Também não acho que alguém já tenha me perguntado sobre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然我的確是喜歡秋天，但我從未將此說出口。{n}連問都應該從未被人問過。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然我的确是喜欢秋天，但我从未将此说出口。{n}连问都应该从未被人问过。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È vero che mi piace l'autunno, ma non lo dico ad alta voce. Non penso che qualcuno mi abbia mai sentito dirlo.

Steam (ST): ...If I asked even my husband what my favorite season is, he would probably be stumped for an answer.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I could even ask my husband what my favorite season is and he would probably be stuck for an answer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......If I asked even my husband what my favorite season is, he would probably be stuck for an answer.
PC Japanese (JP): ……夫でさえ、私の好きな季節はと問われれば、答えに困るだろう。
Russian (RU): ......Даже мой муж, скорее всего, не сразу бы ответил, если бы я спросила, какое моё любимое время года.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu poderia até perguntar isso para o meu marido e ele provavelmente não saberia o que responder.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……被問我喜歡什麼季節的話，就連我丈夫都會苦於回答吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……被问我喜欢什么季节的话，就连我丈夫都会苦于回答吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche se chiedessi a mio marito qual è la mia stagione preferita, non avrebbe la risposta pronta.

Steam (ST): .........N-No. Just once, I told it to a single person......
Umineko Project (UP): ............N‐no.{n}There was one time, one time I told it to a single person.........
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ............N, no. Just once, I told it to a single person.........
PC Japanese (JP): …………い、いや。一人だけ、一度だけ喋ったことがある………。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …………い、いや。{n}一人だけ、一度だけ喋ったことがある………。
Russian (RU): ............Н‐нет.{n}Только однажды... я сказала об этом кое‐кому......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ............N‐Não.{n}Teve uma única vez, onde eu disse para uma única pessoa.........
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………不、不對。{n}我有對某一人，只說過一次………。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …………不、不对。{n}我有对某一人，只说过一次………。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... N-No. Solo una volta, lo raccontai ad una sola persona...

Steam (ST): That's right. .........Shannon...
Umineko Project (UP): That's right. ...............Shannon...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's right.............Shannon...
PC Japanese (JP): そうだ。……………紗音だ…。
Russian (RU): Точно. ............Шаннон...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Giusto. ... Shannon...

Steam (ST): On an autumn day long ago, I happened to be in a good mood, and I mentioned that autumn was my favorite of the four seasons.
Umineko Project (UP): On an autumn day long ago, I happened to be in a good mood, and I mentioned that autumn was my favorite of the four seasons.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On a Fall day long ago, I happened to be in a good mood, and I mentioned that Fall was my favorite of the four seasons.
PC Japanese (JP): ずいぶん昔の秋に、その日はたまたま機嫌が良くて、つい、四季の中では秋が一番好きだと話してしまったことがあった。
Russian (RU): Одним осенним днём мне довелось быть в хорошем настроении, и я отметила, что осень — моё любимое время года.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em um dia de outono, muito tempo atrás, eu estava de bom humor, e mencionei que o outono era, dentre as quatro, a minha estação favorita.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在很久以前的某個秋日，由於碰巧那天心情不錯，所以我就情不自禁地講了，四季中最喜歡秋天。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在很久以前的某个秋日，由于碰巧那天心情不错，所以我就情不自禁地讲了，四季中最喜欢秋天。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tempo fa in un giorno d'autunno, mi era capitato di essere di buon umore, e dissi che l'Autunno era la mia preferita fra le quattro stagioni.

Steam (ST): ...So, the culprit, or one of their accomplices, has to be Shannon...!
Umineko Project (UP): ......I can't believe it... Then the culprit, or one of their accomplices, has to be Shannon...!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......So, the culprit, or one of their accomplices, has to be Shannon...!
PC Japanese (JP): ……何と言うこと、じゃあ、犯人、もしくはその協力者の一人は紗音…！
Russian (RU): ......Выходит, Шаннон либо преступник, либо сообщник!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Não dá para acreditar... Então o culpado, ou um de seus cúmplices, só pode ser a Shannon...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……天啊，那麼，犯人或其協助者之一，竟是紗音…！
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……天啊，那么，犯人或其协助者之一，竟是纱音…！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi il colpevole, o uno dei suoi complici, deve essere Shannon...!

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "The fact that I like autumn can only be known by Shannon... ...In that case, ...this is clear proof that Shannon is involved...! That card with autumn on it is proof...! ...Outrageous... Even though she's served the family for 10 years......"
Umineko Project (UP): "Only Shannon could know that I like autumn... ......In that case, ......this is clear proof that Shannon is involved...! That card with "autumn" on it is proof...! ......Incredible... After ten years of being provided for by our family........."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "The fact that I like Fall can only be known by Shannon... ......In that case, ......this is clear proof that Shannon is involved...! That card with Fall on it is proof...! ......Incredible... Even though she's served the family for 10 years........."
PC Japanese (JP): 「私が秋を好きだというのは、紗音しか知りえないこと…。……なら、……これは紗音がかかわっているという明白な証拠ではありませんか…！　それを、あの秋というカードが証明しています…！　……何と言うこと…。１０年にもわたり、当家の世話になりながらッ………。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私が秋を好きだというのは、紗音しか知りえないこと…。……なら、……これは紗音がかかわっているという明白な証拠ではありませんか…！　それを、あの秋というカードが証明しています…！　……何と言うこと…。１０年にもわたり、当家の世話になりながらッ………」
Russian (RU): "Она единственная знает, что мне нравится осень... ......Тогда...... это прямое доказательство её причастности!.. Карта с 'осенью' — улика!.. ......Невероятно... А ведь она прослужила семье 10 лет........."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Só ela sabia que eu gosto do outono... ......Nesse caso, ......isso claramente prova que a Shannon está envolvida...! A carta escrito "outono" é a prova...! ......Inacreditável... Depois de dez anos servindo à nossa família........."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我喜歡秋天，只有紗音一個人知道…。……那麼，……這不就是紗音涉嫌其中的明明白白的證據嘛…！那張寫著秋字的卡片，就是在證明這一點…！……天啊…。明明都受了我們家長達 10 年的照顧………」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我喜欢秋天，只有纱音一个人知道…。……那么，……这不就是纱音涉嫌其中的明明白白的证据嘛…！那张写着秋字的卡片，就是在证明这一点…！……天啊…。明明都受了我们家长达 10 年的照顾………」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Il fatto che mi piaccia l'autunno poteva saperlo solo Shannon... in questo caso... è una chiara prova che Shannon è coinvolta...! Quella carta con sopra l'autunno ne è la prova...! Incredibile... nonostante abbia servito la famiglia per 10 anni..."

Steam (ST): I trembled and shook with rage.
Umineko Project (UP): I trembled and shook with rage.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 私は怒りに震えながら、わなわなと慄く。
Russian (RU): Я была потрясена и дрожала от гнева.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estremeci de raiva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我氣得渾身顫抖，整個人直哆嗦。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我气得浑身颤抖，整个人直哆嗦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tremai e fui scossa dalla rabbia.

Steam (ST): ...Didn't Kinzo once say that anger is the fastest sedative to cure fear and uncertainty?
Umineko Project (UP): ......Didn't Kinzo once say that the emotion of anger...is the fastest sedative to cure fear and uncertainty?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Didn't Kinzo once say that anger is the fastest sedative to cure fear and uncertainty?
PC Japanese (JP): ……金蔵はかつて、怒りの感情は、恐怖と不安をもっとも早く中和する鎮静剤だと言っていたっけ。
Russian (RU): ......Не Кинзо ли однажды сказал, что гнев — лучшее лекарство от страха и неуверенности?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Kinzo não havia dito certa vez que a emoção da raiva...é o mais rápido sedativo para curar o medo e as incertezas?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……金藏以前好像有說過，憤怒這種感情，是能最快中和恐懼與不安的鎮靜劑。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Kinzo non aveva detto una volta che la rabbia... è il più veloce sedativo per curare paura e incertezza?

Steam (ST): It's easy to tell the most fearful humans from within a crowd.
Umineko Project (UP): It's easy to tell the most fearful humans from within a crowd.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 群衆の中で、もっとも恐怖に怯える人間を見分けるのは容易い。
Russian (RU): Это видно по тем, кто внушает ужас.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dentre uma multidão, é muito fácil dizer quais são os humanos mais assustadores.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 要分辨出一群人中最在擔驚受怕的人，是很容易的一件事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 要分辨出一群人中最在担惊受怕的人，是很容易的一件事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È facile riconoscere la persona più spaventata in una folla.

Steam (ST): They're always the first to get angry.
Umineko Project (UP): They're always the first to get angry.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They're always the first to get angry.
PC Japanese (JP): 必ず最初に怒り出すからだ。
Russian (RU): Они всегда первыми выходят из себя.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為，此人必定第一個發怒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为，此人必定第一个发怒。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono sempre i primi ad arrabbiarsi.

Steam (ST): ...I remember him telling me that.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I remember him telling me that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……そう話してくれたことを思い出す。
Russian (RU): ......Я помню, как он сказал мне это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu lembro dele me dizer isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……我想起了，曾聽過這些話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……我想起了，曾听过这些话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ricordo che lui mi disse così.

Steam (ST): So I realized that this anger was a sign that I was actually frightened, and I tried my best to remain calm...
Umineko Project (UP): So I realized that this anger was a sign that I was actually frightened, and I tried my best to remain calm...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So I realized that this anger was a sign that I was actually frightened, and I tried my best to remain calm...
PC Japanese (JP): だからこそ、その怒りが、今の自分の怯えを如実に示していると知り、私は冷静に戻ろうと努力する…。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, logo percebi que essa raiva era um sinal de que eu estava com medo, e tentei ao máximo me manter calma...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，在知道這份憤怒，是在如實展示此刻自身內心的恐懼後，我努力恢復了冷靜…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，在知道这份愤怒，是在如实展示此刻自身内心的恐惧后，我努力恢复了冷静…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò realizzai che questa rabbia era un segno che in realtà io ero spaventata, e feci del mio meglio per rimanere calma...

Steam (ST): ...However, this is a vital clue for turning things around.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, this is a fascinating clue that I can use to turn things around.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......However, this is a vital clue for turning things around.

Russian (RU): ......Однако эта улика жизненно важна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Porém, essa é uma pista fascinante que eu posso usar para virar o jogo.

Steam (ST): Shannon may not be reliable as a servant, but if she's an accomplice used by that mystery man, this might actually be convenient.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon may not be reliable as a servant, but if she's the accomplice used by that mystery man, this might actually be convenient.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon may not be reliable as a servant, but if she's an accomplice used by that mystery man, this might actually be convenient.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音は使用人としては頼りないが、謎の男に使われている共犯者と考えれば、むしろ都合のいい相手だった。
Russian (RU): Возможно, Шаннон не надёжна как слуга, но если она его сообщница, тем лучше.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A Shannon pode não ser confiável como serviçal, mas se ela está sendo usada como cúmplice do homem misterioso, isso pode se tornar algo muito conveniente.
