Steam (ST): A weak-willed girl. If I threaten her, she'll probably spill the name of the mastermind in an instant.
Umineko Project (UP): She's a timid girl. If I threaten her, she'll probably spill the name of the mastermind in an instant.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A weak-willed girl. If I threaten her, she'll probably spill the name of the mastermind in an instant.
PC Japanese (JP): 気の弱い子だ。脅せば、あっさりと黒幕を吐くに違いない。
Russian (RU): Бесхарактерная девушка. Если я её запугаю, она мигом выдаст имя тайного лидера.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela é uma garota tímida. Se eu ameaçá‐la, ela provavelmente vai entregar o nome do regente desse crime na mesma hora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她是個唯唯諾諾的孩子。無疑只要一放狠話，就會立刻供出黑幕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她是个唯唯诺诺的孩子。无疑只要一放狠话，就会立刻供出黑幕。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Una ragazza con poca forza di volontà. Se la minaccio, probabilmente farà il nome dell'organizzatore del crimine in un istante.

Steam (ST): I'll secretly tell the police about this. It might become a big clue towards arresting the culprit.
Umineko Project (UP): I'll tell the police about this in secret.{n}I'm certain it will be a big clue that will help in arresting the culprit.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'll secretly tell the police about this. It might become a big clue towards arresting the culprit.
PC Japanese (JP): 警察に、こっそりこのことを打ち明けよう。犯人逮捕の大きな手掛かりになるに違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 警察に、こっそりこのことを打ち明けよう。{n}犯人逮捕の大きな手掛かりになるに違いない。
Russian (RU): Я втайне расскажу об этом полиции.{n}Это может сильно помочь в аресте преступника.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E eu irei contar em segredo para a polícia.{n}Tenho certeza que essa será uma grande pista que vai ajudar a prender o culpado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 偷偷地把這事告訴警察吧。{n}這肯定能成為，有助於逮捕犯人的重大線索。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 偷偷地把这事告诉警察吧。{n}这肯定能成为，有助于逮捕犯人的重大线索。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lo riferirò segretamente alla polizia. Potrebbe essere un grande indizio per l'arresto del colpevole.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...That card was probably meant to shock me and get me to do what he says, ...but he's actually dug his own grave."
Umineko Project (UP): "......That card was probably meant to surprise me and control me, ......but he's actually dug his own grave."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……あのカードで私を驚かし、うまく手綱を取れたつもりだったのでしょうが、……むしろ墓穴を掘ったようですね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……あのカードで私を驚かし、うまく手綱を取れたつもりだったのでしょうが、……むしろ墓穴を掘ったようですね」
Russian (RU): "......Эта карта должна была удивить меня и управлять мной...... но на самом деле он сам вырыл себе могилу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Aquela carta provavelmente era para me deixar surpresa e me controlar, ......mas no fim ele acabou cavando a própria cova."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……雖然你以為用那張卡嚇著了我，巧妙掌控住了一切吧，……但這看來反而是自掘墳墓呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……虽然你以为用那张卡吓着了我，巧妙掌控住了一切吧，……但这看来反而是自掘坟墓呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Quella carta probabilmente voleva sorprendermi e controllarmi... ma in realtà si è scavato la fossa da solo."

Steam (ST): {a:c: {p:1:I never told anyone except Shannon that I like autumn}.}
Umineko Project (UP): {a:c:{p:1:I never told anyone except Shannon that I like autumn}.}
Original Witch Hunt (OG): {a:c: {p:1:I never told anyone except Shannon that I like Fall}.}
PC Japanese (JP): {a:c:{p:1:紗音にしか、秋が好きだと語ったことはない。}}
Russian (RU): {a:c:{p:1:Я никому кроме Шаннон не говорила, что мне нравится осень}.}
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {a:c:{p:1:Eu nunca disse a ninguém além de Shannon que eu gostava do outono}.}
Chinese Traditional (CHT): {a:c:{p:1:我只對紗音講過，喜歡秋天。}}
Chinese Simplified (CN): {a:c:{p:1:我只对纱音讲过，喜欢秋天。}}
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): {a:c: {p:1:Non ho mai detto a nessuno eccetto Shannon che mi piace l'autunno}. }

Steam (ST): This is unshakable proof that she's working with the culprit...
Umineko Project (UP): This is unshakable proof that she's working with the culprit......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): これは、彼女が犯人の一味の一人だという、動かぬ証拠になる……。
Russian (RU): Это неоспоримое доказательство того, что она работает на преступника......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa é a prova inabalável de que ela está trabalhando junto com o culpado......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這將會成為，她即是犯人同伙之一的，不可動搖的證據……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这将会成为，她即是犯人同伙之一的，不可动摇的证据……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa è una prova ferrea che lei sta operando col colpevole...

Steam (ST): Though I once thought this time in the closet would crush me with uncertainty and uneasiness, it's actually given me the start of a counterattack.
Umineko Project (UP): Though I'd thought this time in the closet would crush me with uncertainty and uneasiness, it had actually given me the start of a counterattack.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Though I'd thought this time in the closet would crush me with uncertainty and uneasiness, it's actually given me the start of a counterattack.
PC Japanese (JP): 不安と不気味さに押し潰されると思っていたクローゼットの時間は、むしろ私に反撃の糸口を与えてくれた。
Russian (RU): Хотя я думала, что время в шкафу задавит меня неопределённостью и беспокойством, оно, фактически, дало мне основу для контратаки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Embora eu tenha pensado que essa hora dentro do armário iria me esmagar com incertezas e preocupações, ela acabou sendo o gatilho para o meu contra‐ataque.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 本以為將會被不安與陰森壓垮的躲在壁櫥中的時間，反倒給了我反擊的線索。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 本以为将会被不安与阴森压垮的躲在壁橱中的时间，反倒给了我反击的线索。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nonostante avessi pensato che questo momento nell'armadio mi avrebbe schiacciato con incertezza e difficoltà, in realtà mi era stata dato il principio di un contrattacco.

Steam (ST): If I wasn't given this time in the darkness, I probably wouldn't have noticed this.
Umineko Project (UP): If I hadn't been given this time in the darkness, I probably wouldn't have noticed this.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I wasn't given this time in the darkness, I probably wouldn't have noticed this.
PC Japanese (JP): こうして暗闇での時間を与えられなければ、私はこのことに気付くことも出来なかっただろう。
Russian (RU): Я могла бы не заметить, если бы не была сейчас в кромешной тьме.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu não tivesse sido mandada para passar uma hora no escuro, eu provavelmente não teria percebido isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 若是沒得到像這樣待在黑暗中靜思的時間的話，我一定不會意識到這一點吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 若是没得到像这样待在黑暗中静思的时间的话，我一定不会意识到这一点吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se non avessi avuto questo momento nell'oscurità, probabilmente non me ne sarei accorta.

Steam (ST): I'm almost grateful to the culprit for making up this foolish game.
Umineko Project (UP): I felt almost grateful to the culprit for making up this foolish game.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'm almost grateful to the culprit for making up this foolish game.
PC Japanese (JP): 愚かなゲームを気取った犯人に、むしろ感謝したい気分だった。
Russian (RU): Я почти что благодарна преступнику, придумавшему эту глупую игру.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu quase me sinto grata ao culpado por inventar essa brincadeira idiota.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 現在反而都想感謝下，那布下這愚蠢遊戲的犯人了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 现在反而都想感谢下，那布下这愚蠢游戏的犯人了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono quasi grata al colpevole per aver fatto questo gioco stupido.

Steam (ST): ...My mood brightened.
Umineko Project (UP): ......My mood brightened.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……気分が高揚する。
Russian (RU): ......Мне стало гораздо легче.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Meu humor melhorou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……情緒高漲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……情绪高涨。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il mio umore migliorò.

Steam (ST): ...I still can't guarantee that my husband is safe, but I'll definitely get him back and force the culprit to face judgment...
Umineko Project (UP): ...I still couldn't guarantee that my husband was safe, but I was determined to take him back and force the culprit to face judgment...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...I still can't guarantee that my husband is safe, but I'll definitely take him back and force the culprit to face judgment...
PC Japanese (JP): …夫の無事はまだ確保できないが、必ずや取り戻し、犯人を裁きの場へ引き摺り出してやる…。
Russian (RU): ...Я всё ещё не могу гарантировать, что мой муж в безопасности, но я обязательно верну его и заставлю преступника предстать перед судом...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Eu ainda não posso garantir a segurança do meu marido, mas agora estou determinada a salvá‐lo e levar o culpado a julgamento...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖尚且無法確保丈夫的平安，但我一定會將他救回來，並將犯人揪去審判之所…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽尚且无法确保丈夫的平安，但我一定会将他救回来，并将犯人揪去审判之所…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ancora non posso assicurarmi che mio marito sia salvo, ma lo riporterò sicuramente indietro e obbligherò il colpevole a subire la sua sentenza...

Steam (ST): I clenched my fists tightly...and further strengthened my resolve to avoid losing this fight at any cost...
Umineko Project (UP): I gripped my fists tightly, and further strengthened my resolve to avoid losing this fight at any cost...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I gripped my fists tightly, and further strengthened my resolve to avoid losing this fight at any cost...
PC Japanese (JP): 私は強く拳を握り、決してこの戦いには負けられないと、さらに意思を強固にするのだった…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 私は強く拳を握り、決してこの戦いには負けられないと、さらに意志を強固にするのだった…。
Russian (RU): Я плотно сжала кулаки и укрепила свою решимость, чтобы любой ценой не проиграть этот бой...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu cerrei meus punhos e direcionei minhas forças à minha determinação de evitar a derrota a qualquer custo...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我握緊拳頭，心想著這一戰決不能輸，更進一步地強固了意志…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我握紧拳头，心想着这一战决不能输，更进一步地强固了意志…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Strinsi forte i pugni, e rafforzai ulteriormente la mia risoluzione di evitare di perdere questa battaglia a qualsiasi costo...

Steam (ST): *rattle*rattle*!!
Umineko Project (UP): Rattle, rattle!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): ガチャガチャ！！
Russian (RU): *клац*клац*!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): *clank*clank*!!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 咔恰咔恰！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): *rattle*rattle*!!

Steam (ST): At that time, I heard the sudden sound of someone trying to force the locked door open, and my heart leapt.
Umineko Project (UP): At that moment, I heard the sudden sound of someone trying to force a locked door open, and my heart leapt.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At that time, I heard the sudden sound of someone trying to force the locked door open, and my heart leapt.
PC Japanese (JP): その時、突然、施錠された扉を無理やり開こうとする音が聞こえて、私の心臓を飛び上がらせた。
Russian (RU): В этот момент я вдруг услышала такой звук, будто кто‐то хотел силой открыть запертую дверь, и моё сердце подскочило.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquele momento, eu ouvi o som repentino de alguém tentando forçar a porta para abri‐la, e o meu coração subiu pela boca.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 正在此時，突然響起了硬要把鎖著的門打開的聲音，我的心臟都跳到嗓子眼了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 正在此时，突然响起了硬要把锁着的门打开的声音，我的心脏都跳到嗓子眼了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quel momento, sentii il suono improvviso di qualcuno che forzava l'apertura della porta chiusa, e il mio cuore sussultò.

Steam (ST): "...Oh, it was unlocked."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Oh, it was unlocked."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……何や、開いとったんか。」
Russian (RU): "......О, тут не заперто."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Ah, está aberta."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……搞啥吶，不是沒鎖麼。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……搞啥呐，不是没锁么。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Oh, non era chiusa."

Steam (ST): The voice was Hideyoshi's. I heard that quiet voice, as though he was talking to himself, coming from what was probably the hallway.
Umineko Project (UP): The voice was Hideyoshi's.{n}I heard a quiet voice, as though he was talking to himself, coming from what was probably the hallway.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The voice was Hideyoshi's. I heard a quiet voice, as though he was talking to himself, coming from what was probably the hallway.
PC Japanese (JP): その声は秀吉さんのものだった。独り言のような小さな声で、多分、廊下から聞こえた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その声は秀吉さんのものだった。{n}独り言のような小さな声で、多分、廊下から聞こえた。
Russian (RU): Это сказал Хидэёши.{n}Я услышала тихий голос — словно он говорил сам с собой, — донёсшийся, судя по всему, из коридора.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era a voz de Hideyoshi.{n}Eu ouvi uma voz baixa vindo do corredor, como se ele estivesse falando consigo mesmo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是秀吉的聲音。{n}因為像是自言自語的小聲，所以人大概是在走廊上吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是秀吉的声音。{n}因为像是自言自语的小声，所以人大概是在走廊上吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La voce era quella di Hideyoshi. Sentii una voce tranquilla come se stesse parlando da solo, provenire probabilmente dal corridoio.

Steam (ST): Apparently, he had thought it was locked and tried to unlock it, but had ended up locking the unlocked door instead.
Umineko Project (UP): Apparently, he had thought it was locked and tried to unlock it, but had ended up locking the unlocked door instead.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Apparently, he had thought it was locked and tried to unlock it, but had ended up locking the unlocked door instead.
PC Japanese (JP): どうやら、施錠されていると思って鍵を開けたつもりが、逆になってしまい、開いている扉を施錠してノブを引いてしまったらしい。
Russian (RU): Видимо, он думал, что там заперто, и попытался отпереть, но вместо этого запер незапертую дверь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ao que parece, ele pensou que estava trancada e tentou destrancar, mas acabou trancando a porta ao invés de destrancar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來，他好像是以為門鎖著，而插入鑰匙轉了一下，但結果卻把沒鎖的門給鎖上，而轉不動門把手了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来，他好像是以为门锁着，而插入钥匙转了一下，但结果却把没锁的门给锁上，而转不动门把手了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Apparentemente, lui aveva pensato che fosse chiusa e aveva provato a sbloccarla, ma era finito col chiudere invece la porta aperta.

Steam (ST): Once again, there was the sound of the lock turning, and now, the door opened with a faint sound...
Umineko Project (UP): Once again, there was the sound of the lock turning, and this time, the door opened with a faint sound......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Once again, there was the sound of the lock turning, and now, the door opened with a faint sound......
PC Japanese (JP): もう一度、鍵を回す音がして、今度は軽やかな音と共に扉が開かれた……。
Russian (RU): Снова раздался звук поворачивающегося замка, и вот, дверь со слабым скрипом открылась...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mais uma vez, o som da tranca virando, e dessa vez, seguido pelo leve som da porta se abrindo......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 又響起了一聲轉動鑰匙的聲音，這次是伴隨著輕響，打開了門……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 又响起了一声转动钥匙的声音，这次是伴随着轻响，打开了门……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ancora una volta, ci fu il suono della chiave che girava, e in quel momento, la porta venne aperta con un debole suono...

Steam (ST): ...Why... is Hideyoshi-san in this room...?!
Umineko Project (UP): ......Why......is Hideyoshi‐san in this room......?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Why......is Hideyoshi-san in this room......?!
PC Japanese (JP): ……秀吉さんが、……どうしてこの部屋に……？！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……秀吉さんが、……どうしてこの部屋に……？！
Russian (RU): ......Что... ...Хидэёши здесь делает?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Por que......o Hideyoshi‐san veio para este quarto......?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……秀吉，……為什麼會來這個房間……？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……秀吉，……为什么会来这个房间……？！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché... Hideyoshi-san è in questa stanza...?!

Steam (ST): Footsteps that sounded like his came in, and there was the sound of him closing and locking the door behind him.
Umineko Project (UP): Footsteps which sounded like his came in, and there was the sound of him closing and locking the door behind him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): どかどかと、彼らしい足音が入ってきて、扉を後手に閉めて、施錠するような音がする。
Russian (RU): Он вошёл — послышались шаги, а затем закрыл и запер за собой дверь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Passos barulhentos entraram no quarto, e ouviu‐se o som dele fechando e chaveando a porta atrás dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 響起了有他風格的，動靜挺大地走進房中的腳步聲，與像是反手關門上鎖的聲音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 响起了有他风格的，动静挺大地走进房中的脚步声，与像是反手关门上锁的声音。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Risuonarono passi come se stesse entrando e ci fu il suono di lui che chiudeva e serrava la porta.

Steam (ST): Then came what seemed to be the sound of him setting the chain.
Umineko Project (UP): Then came what seemed to be the sound of him setting the chain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then came what seemed to be the sound of him setting the chain.
PC Japanese (JP): チェーンロックを掛けているらしい音も続いた。
Russian (RU): Потом он вроде бы повесил цепочку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E logo o som do que parecia a corrente da porta sendo colocada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 緊接著的是一聲，像是鎖好鏈條鎖的聲音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 紧接着的是一声，像是锁好链条锁的声音。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi ci fu quello che sembrava essere il suono di lui che metteva la catena alla porta.

Steam (ST): ......Don't tell me... Hideyoshi-san... is the mastermind...?! Or else, an accomplice...?!
Umineko Project (UP): .........Don't tell me......Hideyoshi‐san......is the mastermind...?!{n}Or else, an accomplice...?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........Don't tell me......Hideyoshi-san......is the mastermind...?! Or else, an accomplice...?!
PC Japanese (JP): ………まさか、…秀吉さんが、……黒幕…？！　あるいは、その一味…？！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………まさか、…秀吉さんが、……黒幕…？！{n}あるいは、その一味…？！
Russian (RU): .........Неужели... ...Хидэёши и есть...... тайный лидер?!{n}Или сообщник?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Não pode ser......então o Hideyoshi‐san......é o mentor do crime...?!{n}Ou talvez um cúmplice...?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………難道，…秀吉，……是黑幕…？！{n}或犯人的同伙…？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………难道，…秀吉，……是黑幕…？！{n}或犯人的同伙…？！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non ditemi che... Hideyoshi-san... è l'organizzatore...?! O forse, un complice...?!

Steam (ST): Is he planning to do something to me in this room...?
Umineko Project (UP): Is he planning to do something to me in this room...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): 私にこの部屋で危害を加えるつもりだろうか…？
Russian (RU): Он планирует что‐то со мной сделать?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele planeja fazer algo neste quarto...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他是想在這房間，對我施加傷害嗎…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他是想在这房间，对我施加伤害吗…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ha in mente di farmi qualcosa in questa stanza...?

Steam (ST): It would take some time to unlock the door from this side, much less remove the chain.
Umineko Project (UP): The door may only be locked from the inside, but it will still take some time to remove the chain.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It would take some time to unlock the door from this side, much less to remove the chain.
PC Japanese (JP): こちら側からの施錠とはいえ、チェーンロックを外すのに手間取る。
Russian (RU): Потребуется время, чтобы отпереть дверь с этой стороны, а уж тем более чтобы снять цепочку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A porta só pode ser trancada por dentro, mas ainda leva um certo tempo até remover a corrente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然是從門內側上的鎖，但解除鏈條鎖是得花一番工夫的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然是从门内侧上的锁，但解除链条锁是得花一番工夫的。

Steam (ST): ...If Hideyoshi-san doesn't intend to let me escape from here, he won't give me enough time to undo the chain...
Umineko Project (UP): ......If Hideyoshi‐san doesn't intend to let me escape from here, there's no chance he'll give me time to fumble around with the chain...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......If Hideyoshi-san doesn't intend to let me escape from here, he won't give me enough time to undo the chain...
PC Japanese (JP): ……もし秀吉さんが私を逃すつもりがないのなら、私がもたもたとチェーンを外す時間を与えるわけがない…。
Russian (RU): ......Если Хидэёши не намерен выпускать меня отсюда, он не даст мне достаточно времени на снятие цепочки...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Se o Hideyoshi‐san não pretende me deixar escapar, não tem como ele ceder a oportunidade de ficar futilmente tentando mexer na corrente...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……如果秀吉不想放跑我的話，我不可能有時間，慢騰騰地取下門鏈…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……如果秀吉不想放跑我的话，我不可能有时间，慢腾腾地取下门链…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Se Hideyoshi-san non ha intenzione di farmi scappare da qui, non mi darà abbastanza tempo per rimuovere la catena...

Steam (ST): In that case, ...if he opens the closet door... and sees me crouching here pathetically, ...just what kind of fearsome words will he say...?
Umineko Project (UP): In that case...............when he opens the closet door wide in just a moment......and looks down upon me sitting here pathetically, ......just what kind of horrifying words will he say...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that case........., ......if he opens the closet door......and sees me crouching here pathetically......just what kind of fearsome words will he say...?
PC Japanese (JP): ならば………、……今にもこのクローゼットをがばっと開き、……みすぼらしく座り込んだ私を見下ろし、……一体、どんな恐ろしい言葉を投げかけてくるというのか…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ならば………、……今にもこのクローゼットをがばっと開き、……みすぼらしく座り込んだ私を見下ろし、……一体、どんな恐ろしい言葉を投げかけてくるというのか…。
Russian (RU): Тогда............... если он откроет шкаф...... и увидит меня, жалко присевшую здесь...... какие страшные слова он скажет?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse caso...............assim que ele abrir a porta do armário......e me ver sentada aqui de forma patética, ......que tipo de palavras horríveis ele irá dizer...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那麼………，……他現在要是忽然猛地打開這壁櫥，……低頭看到寒磣地坐在裡面的我，……究竟，又會說出多麼可怕的言語呢…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那么………，……他现在要是忽然猛地打开这壁橱，……低头看到寒碜地坐在里面的我，……究竟，又会说出多么可怕的言语呢…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questo caso... se aprisse l'anta dell'armadio... e mi vedesse pateticamente rannicchiata qui... che tipo di parole terribili mi direbbe...?

Steam (ST): I don't want to be found, I don't want to be found... I beg you, pass right on by the closet door... Please keep going into the center of the room...!
Umineko Project (UP): I don't want to be found, I don't want to be found...{n}I beg you, pass right on by the closet door...{n}Please keep going into the center of the room......!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I don't want to be found, I don't want to be found... I beg you, pass right on by the closet door... Please keep going into the center of the room......!
PC Japanese (JP): 見つかりたくない見つかりたくない…。お願いだからクローゼットの前をそのまま通り過ぎて…。どうかそのまま奥へ行って……！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 見つかりたくない見つかりたくない…。{n}お願いだからクローゼットの前をそのまま通り過ぎて…。{n}どうかそのまま奥へ行って……！
Russian (RU): Я не хочу, чтобы меня нашли, не хочу, чтобы меня нашли...{n}Умоляю, пройди мимо шкафа...{n}Продолжай идти к центру комнаты!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não quero ser encontrada, não quero ser encontrada...{n}Eu imploro, passe direto pelo armário...{n}Por favor, vá direto para o centro do quarto......!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不想被他發現，不想被他發現…。{n}拜託了，請直接從壁櫥前走過吧…。{n}請千萬直接往裡面走吧……！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不想被他发现，不想被他发现…。{n}拜托了，请直接从壁橱前走过吧…。{n}请千万直接往里面走吧……！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non voglio essere trovata, non voglio essere trovata... ti scongiuro, passa oltre l'anta dell'armadio... ti prego, continua ad andare verso il centro della stanza...!

Steam (ST): My head was so filled with a throbbing sound that it felt like it was about to explode, and I almost missed hearing his noisy footsteps.
Umineko Project (UP): My head was filled almost to bursting with a throbbing sound so loud that I almost missed hearing his noisy footsteps.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): My head was so filled with a throbbing sound that it felt like it was about to explode, and I almost missed hearing his noisy footsteps.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼の賑やかな足音を聞き逃すくらいに、頭の中は爆発しそうな鼓動音でいっぱいだった。
Russian (RU): Моя голова была до того забита пульсирующим звуком, что казалось, будто она сейчас расколется, и я уже почти не слышала его громкие шаги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha cabeça estava prestes a explodir com um som palpitante que eu quase não consegui mais ouvir os barulhentos passos dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 腦袋裡充滿了瀕臨爆炸的心跳聲，以至於把他那動靜不小的腳步聲都給聽漏了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 脑袋里充满了濒临爆炸的心跳声，以至于把他那动静不小的脚步声都给听漏了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La mia testa era così piena di un suono martellante che sembrava come se stesse per esplodere, e quasi non sentii i suoi rumorosi passi.

Steam (ST): So when I heard a clunking sound coming from the center of the room, I finally realized that he'd passed by the closet...and was deeply relieved.
Umineko Project (UP): So when I heard a clunking sound coming from the center of the room, I finally realized that he'd passed by the closet, and was deeply relieved.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So when I heard a clunking sound coming from the center of the room, I finally realized that he'd passed by the closet, and was deeply relieved.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、ガタンガタンという音が、部屋の奥の方から聞こえてきた時、彼がクローゼットの前を無事に通り過ぎたものだと知り、深く安堵した。
Russian (RU): Услышав глухой звук из центра комнаты, я наконец поняла, что он прошёл мимо шкафа, и значительно успокоилась.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, assim que ouvi um som pesado vindo do centro do quarto, eu finalmente percebi que ele havia passado reto pelo armário, e suspirei aliviada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，在聽到房間深處傳來“喀嘡喀嘡”的聲響時，我才得知，他已什麼都沒做地從壁櫥前走過，從而深深地安下了心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，在听到房间深处传来“喀嘡喀嘡”的声响时，我才得知，他已什么都没做地从壁橱前走过，从而深深地安下了心。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò quando sentii un suono sordo provenire dal centro della stanza, realizzai finalmente che era passato oltre l'armadio, e ne fui profondamente sollevata.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "...Just in case. In this weather, it's pretty much night out there anyway."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Just in case. Can't tell if it's day or night in this weather anyway."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……念のためや。どうせ、この天気じゃ、夜と変わらんわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……念のためや。どうせ、この天気じゃ、夜と変わらんわ」
Russian (RU): "......На всякий случай. В такую погоду даже не скажешь, день сейчас или ночь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Só por precaução. Não consigo nem mais dizer se é dia ou noite com esse tempo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……小心為上吶。反正，這天氣是與晚上麽兩樣。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……小心为上呐。反正，这天气是与晚上么两样。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Giusto in caso. Non posso sapere comunque se sia giorno o notte con questo tempo."

Steam (ST): As he whispered, he did something that made a clunking sound. ...He was probably closing the shutters on the windows.
Umineko Project (UP): As he muttered, he did something that made a clunking sound.{n}......He was probably closing the shutters on the windows.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As he whispered, he did something that made a clunking sound.......He was probably closing the shutters on the windows.
PC Japanese (JP): そう呟きながら、ガタガタと何かをしている。……恐らく、窓の鎧戸を閉めているのだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そう呟きながら、ガタガタと何かをしている。{n}……恐らく、窓の鎧戸を閉めているのだろう。
Russian (RU): После его шёпота раздался глухой стук.{n}......Наверное, закрывает ставни на окнах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto murmurava, ele fez algo que emitiu um som pesado.{n}......Ele provavelmente estava fechando as venezianas das janelas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他邊這麼嘟噥著，邊“喀噠喀噠”地做著些什麼。{n}……恐怕，是在關百葉窗吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他边这么嘟哝着，边“喀哒喀哒”地做着些什么。{n}……恐怕，是在关百叶窗吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come lui sospirò, fece qualcosa che produsse un rumore secco. ... Probabilmente stava chiudendo le persiane delle finestre.

Steam (ST): Just in case? In case I try to escape out the window...?
Umineko Project (UP): Just in case?{n}In case I try to escape out the window...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just in case? In case I try to escape out the window...?
PC Japanese (JP): 何のために？私が窓からさえも逃げ出せないようにするために…？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 何のために？{n}私が窓からさえも逃げ出せないようにするために…？
Russian (RU): На всякий случай?{n}На случай, если я попытаюсь выбраться через окно?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Só por precaução?{n}No caso de eu tentar escapar pela janela...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 幹嘛要關？{n}是為了不讓我從窗戶逃走…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 干嘛要关？{n}是为了不让我从窗户逃走…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Giusto in caso? In caso io provassi a scappare dalla finestra...?

Steam (ST): No, ...that can't be it.
Umineko Project (UP): No, ......that can't be it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, ......não pode ser isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不，……應該不是這樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不，……应该不是这样。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No... non può essere.

Steam (ST): That's right.
Umineko Project (UP): That's right.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's right.
PC Japanese (JP): そうだ。
Russian (RU): Точно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Esatto.

Steam (ST): When I left the parlor, everyone was talking about possibly taking a break.
Umineko Project (UP): When I left the parlor, everyone was talking about possibly taking a break.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I left the parlor, everyone was talking about possibly taking a break.
PC Japanese (JP): 私が客間を出て行く時、みんなも一服しようみたいな話になっていなかったっけ。
Russian (RU): Когда я покидала гостиную, все обсуждали возможность взять перерыв.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando eu deixei a sala de jantar, todos estavam falando da possibilidade de fazerem um intervalo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在我離開客廳時，大家是不是好像也有說，要稍事休息來著？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在我离开客厅时，大家是不是好像也有说，要稍事休息来着？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando me ne sono andata dal salotto, tutti stavano parlando dell'eventualità di fare una pausa.

Steam (ST): After all, several murders have occurred. And the weather's bad. ...There'd be nothing abnormal if someone chose to rest in a guest room here instead of returning to the guesthouse.
Umineko Project (UP): After all, several murders had occurred. And the weather was bad.{n}......There would be nothing abnormal about resting in a guest room here instead of returning to the guesthouse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After all, several murders had occurred. And the weather was bad.......There would be nothing abnormal about resting in a guest room here instead of returning to the guesthouse.
PC Japanese (JP): 何しろ、殺人事件があったのだ。それに天気だって悪い。……ゲストハウスへは戻らず、客室で休みを取ろうと言い出しても、不思議はない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 何しろ、殺人事件があったのだ。それに天気だって悪い。{n}……ゲストハウスへは戻らず、客室で休みを取ろうと言い出しても、不思議はない。
Russian (RU): В конце концов, произошло несколько убийств. И погода плохая.{n}......Нет ничего странного в том, чтобы отдохнуть в гостевой комнате вместо возвращения в домик для гостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, ocorreram diversos assassinatos. E o tempo está horrível.{n}......Não tem nada de errado em vir descansar em um quarto de hóspedes ao invés de retornar para a casa de hóspedes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟是發生了殺人事件。再加上，天氣也很糟。{n}……會說出“不回賓館，在客房休息下”，也並不奇怪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟是发生了杀人事件。再加上，天气也很糟。{n}……会说出“不回宾馆，在客房休息下”，也并不奇怪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopotutto, si erano verificati diversi omicidi. E il tempo era pessimo. ... Non c'era niente di strano nel riposare in una stanza per gli ospiti invece di tornare alla casa degli ospiti.

Steam (ST): In that case, locking up and closing the shutters to guarantee safety is the proper course of action to take.
Umineko Project (UP): In that case, locking up and closing the shutters to guarantee safety was the proper course of action to take.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In that case, locking up and closing the shutters to guarantee safety was the proper course of action to take.
PC Japanese (JP): ならば、安全の確保のためにしっかり施錠し、鎧戸も閉めるのは正しい対応だ。
Russian (RU): В таком случае, запирание и закрытие ставен — надлежащая гарантия безопасности.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nesse caso, fechar e trancar as venezianas para garantir a segurança é uma ação normal a se tomar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那麼，為了確保安全，好好鎖好門窗，關上百葉窗，這是正確之舉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那么，为了确保安全，好好锁好门窗，关上百叶窗，这是正确之举。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questo caso, chiudere e serrare le persiane per garantire la sicurezza erano le giuste cose da fare.

Steam (ST): When he finished closing the shutters, ......there was a *thunk*, as though he'd flopped over on the bed.
Umineko Project (UP): When he finished closing the shutters, ......there was a thunk as though he had flopped over on the bed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When he finished closing the shutters, ......there was a *thunk* as though he had flopped over on the bed.
PC Japanese (JP): 鎧戸を閉め終えると、……どかっと、ベッドに倒れこむような音が聞こえた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 鎧戸を閉め終えると、……どかっと、ベッドに倒れこむような音が聞こえた。
Russian (RU): Когда ставни были закрыты...... раздался *хлоп*, словно он повалился на кровать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando ele terminou de fechar as venezianas, ......uma forte batida como se ele tivesse caído sobre a cama.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 關完百葉窗後，響起了，……撲通，一聲，像是倒到床上的聲音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 关完百叶窗后，响起了，……扑通，一声，像是倒到床上的声音。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando finì di chiudere le persiane... ci fu un *thunk* come se fosse crollato sul letto.

Steam (ST): ...It was surprising how much of the situation could be grasped just by the sound.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was surprising how much of the situation could be grasped just by the sound.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Russian (RU): ......Удивительно, сколько можно понять по одному звуку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......É surpreendente o quanto da situação pode ser entendida apenas pelo som.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……光憑聲音，倒也是出乎意料地能夠搞懂狀況呢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……光凭声音，倒也是出乎意料地能够搞懂状况呢。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era sorprendente quanto si poteva capire della situazione semplicemente dai rumori.

Steam (ST): ......What's going on here...?
Umineko Project (UP): .........What's going on here......?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........What's going on here......?
PC Japanese (JP): ………これは、どういうことだろう……？
Russian (RU): .........В чём дело?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........O que está acontecendo aqui......?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………這究竟是怎麼回事呢……？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………这究竟是怎么回事呢……？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Che cosa sta succedendo...?

Steam (ST): Did the man from 19 years ago...plan all this out to put me in the same room as Hideyoshi-san...?
Umineko Project (UP): Did the man from 19 years ago......plan all this out to put me in the same room as Hideyoshi‐san...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Did the man from 19 years ago......plan all this out to put me in the same room as Hideyoshi-san...?
PC Japanese (JP): １９年前の男は、……私と秀吉さんを同室させたくて、こんなことを仕組んだのか…？
Russian (RU): Человек из 19‐летней давности...... задумал сделать так, чтобы я оказалась в одной комнате с Хидэёши?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Será que o homem de 19 anos atrás......planejou isso para me deixar dentro do mesmo quarto que o Hideyoshi‐san...?

Umineko Project (UP): No, ......that probably...isn't true.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Steam (ST): He probably planned on me hiding here, ...but Hideyoshi-san coming to take a rest here must have been outside the scope of his plan.
Umineko Project (UP): Clearly he planned on me hiding here, ......but Hideyoshi‐san coming to take a rest here must have been outside the scope of his plan.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He probably planned on me hiding here, ......but Hideyoshi-san coming to take a rest here must have been outside the scope of his plan.
PC Japanese (JP): 私をここに隠れさせるところまでは計算の内だろうが、……秀吉さんが、この部屋に休憩に訪れたのは、恐らく、計算外に違いない。
Russian (RU): Может, он и планировал, что я спрячусь здесь...... но пришедший отдохнуть Хидэёши, скорее всего, выходит за рамки его плана.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu me esconder aqui claramente era parte do plano dele, ......mas o Hideyoshi‐san vir aqui para descansar deve estar fora do seu escopo de seu plano original.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然叫我藏在這裡是在他的計劃之內，……但秀吉來這房間休息一事，恐怕無疑是在他的計劃之外。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然叫我藏在这里是在他的计划之内，……但秀吉来这房间休息一事，恐怕无疑是在他的计划之外。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Probabilmente aveva intenzione di farmi nascondere qui... ma Hideyoshi-san che veniva qui a riposare doveva essere fuori dal suo piano.

Steam (ST): Thinking about it that way, ......having him in the room might be odd, but it also might guarantee my own safety.
Umineko Project (UP): Thinking about it that way, .........having him in the room...might help to secure my own safety in an odd sort of way.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Thinking about it that way, .........having him in the room might be odd, but it also might guarantee my own safety.
PC Japanese (JP): そう考えると、………彼が在室してくれることで、歪な形ではあるが、自分の安全は保証されるのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Если так подумать......... странно быть в комнате вместе с ним, но это также гарантирует мою безопасность.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pensando dessa forma, .........tê‐lo neste quarto...pode me ajudar a me proteger, mesmo que seja de uma forma estranha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這麼一想，………通過秀吉待在房間裡，雖是以異樣的形式，但也算是保證了自己的安全也說不定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这么一想，………通过秀吉待在房间里，虽是以异样的形式，但也算是保证了自己的安全也说不定。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pensandoci... averlo in questa stanza può essere strano, ma allo stesso tempo garantisce la mia sicurezza.

Steam (ST): ...Unlike his wife, Hideyoshi-san is the kind of person I can talk to. If Eva-san comes, things will probably get complicated.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Unlike his wife, Hideyoshi‐san is the kind of person I can talk to.{n}If Eva‐san comes, things will probably get complicated.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Unlike his wife, Hideyoshi-san is the kind of person I can talk to. If Eva-san comes, things will probably get complicated.
PC Japanese (JP): ……妻の絵羽さんはともかく、秀吉さんは話せる人だ。絵羽さんがやって来ると、きっとややこしくなるだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……妻の絵羽さんはともかく、秀吉さんは話せる人だ。{n}絵羽さんがやって来ると、きっとややこしくなるだろう。
Russian (RU): ......В отличие от его жены, Хидэёши из таких людей, с которыми я могу поговорить.{n}Приди сюда Ева, было бы сложнее.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Diferente da esposa dele, o Hideyoshi‐san é o tipo de pessoa na qual eu posso conversar.{n}Se fosse a Eva‐san, as coisas provavelmente iriam ficar complicadas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……先不管他妻子繪羽怎麼樣，秀吉可是個能溝通的人。{n}如果等到繪羽來了，那事情一定會變得很複雜吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……先不管他妻子绘羽怎么样，秀吉可是个能沟通的人。{n}如果等到绘羽来了，那事情一定会变得很复杂吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... A differenza di sua moglie, Hideyoshi-san è il tipo di persona con cui posso parlare. Se venisse Eva-san, le cose si farebbero complicate.

Steam (ST): Maybe I should slip out of this closet now while he's still alone, reveal everything to just him, and ask for help...
Umineko Project (UP): Maybe I should slip out of this closet now while he's still alone, reveal everything just to him, and ask for help......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe I should slip out of this closet now while he's still alone, reveal everything to just him, and ask for help......
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉さんがひとりでいる今の内に、ここをごそごそと抜け出し、彼にこっそりと全てを打ち明け、助けを求めてもいいのではないだろうか……。
Russian (RU): Может, мне выйти из шкафа, пока он ещё один, раскрыть ему всё и попросить о помощи......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez eu deva sair do armário agora que ele ainda está sozinho, contar tudo e pedir ajudar......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我是不是該趁只有秀吉一個人在的此刻，悄悄溜出壁櫥，偷偷向他全盤托出，尋求幫助呢……？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我是不是该趁只有秀吉一个人在的此刻，悄悄溜出壁橱，偷偷向他全盘托出，寻求帮助呢……？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse dovrei uscire ora da questo armadio mentre è ancora solo, rivelargli tutto e chiedergli aiuto...

Steam (ST): But if I do that, my husband might be killed...
Umineko Project (UP): But if I do that, my husband might be killed...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But if I do that, my husband might be killed...
PC Japanese (JP): でも、そうしたら、夫が殺されてしまうかもしれない…。
Russian (RU): Но так моего мужа могут убить...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas se eu fizer isso, meu marido pode acabar sendo morto...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，這麼做了的話，我丈夫也許就會被殺…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，这么做了的话，我丈夫也许就会被杀…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma se lo facessi, mio marito potrebbe venire ucciso...

Steam (ST): Until my husband is released, I shouldn't do anything rash...
Umineko Project (UP): It isn't wise to do anything rash until my husband is released......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Until my husband is released, I shouldn't do anything rash......
PC Japanese (JP): 夫が解放されるまでは、不用意なことはすべきではない……。
Russian (RU): Пока его не освободят, мне нельзя делать ничего опрометчивого......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não é sábio fazer nada precipitado até que o meu marido seja libertado......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在犯人放了我丈夫前，不該魯莽行事……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在犯人放了我丈夫前，不该鲁莽行事……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fino a quando non viene liberato, non dovrei fare niente di affrettato...

Steam (ST): Should I go out and talk, or hide in here?
Umineko Project (UP): Should I go out and talk, or hide in here?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Should I go out and talk, or hide in here?
PC Japanese (JP): ここを出て話すか、このまま息を潜めているか。
Russian (RU): Мне выйти и поговорить или же прятаться здесь?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu deveria sair e falar com ele ou ficar escondida aqui?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是出去與他商量好呢，還是繼續壓低呼吸躲在這好呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是出去与他商量好呢，还是继续压低呼吸躲在这好呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dovrei uscire fuori e parlare, o nascondermi qui?

Steam (ST): Moaning from my headache and biting my lower lip, I resisted the urge to crawl out of here...
Umineko Project (UP): Moaning from my headache and biting my lower lip, I resisted the temptation to crawl out of here...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Moaning from my headache and biting my lower lip, I resisted the urge to crawl out of here...
PC Japanese (JP): 私は頭痛に呻きながら下唇を噛んで、ここから這い出たい誘惑に耐えた…。
Russian (RU): Застонав от головной боли и закусив нижнюю губу, я поборола желание вылезти отсюда...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Gemendo por causa da minha dor de cabeça e mordendo meu lábio inferior, eu resisti à tentação de rastejar para fora...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我邊因頭疼小聲哼哼，邊咬住下唇，強忍住想爬出壁櫥的誘惑…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我边因头疼小声哼哼，边咬住下唇，强忍住想爬出壁橱的诱惑…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gemendo per l'emicrania e mordendomi il labbro inferiore, resistetti all'urgenza di strisciare fuori di qui...

Steam (ST): Even if I talk with Hideyoshi-san, I don't know where my husband is being held. I'm sure the traitor who's observing me is nearby.
Umineko Project (UP): Even if I talk with Hideyoshi‐san, I don't know where my husband is being held. I'm sure the informant who's observing me is nearby as well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even if I talk with Hideyoshi-san, I don't know where my husband is being held. I'm sure the traitor who's observing me is nearby.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉さんに相談したって、夫の捕らわれている場所はわからない。私を監視しているに違いない内通者だってきっと身近にいる。
Russian (RU): Даже если я поговорю с Хидэёши, мне не известно, где держат моего мужа. Я уверена, что предатель, наблюдающий за мной, близко.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo se eu falar com o Hideyoshi‐san, eu não sei onde o meu marido está sendo mantido preso. Tenho certeza que o informante que está me observando deve estar por perto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就算與秀吉商量好了，也根本不知道我丈夫被關在了哪。無疑正在監視著我的內奸，也肯定身在附近。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就算与秀吉商量好了，也根本不知道我丈夫被关在了哪。无疑正在监视着我的内奸，也肯定身在附近。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se parlassi con Hideyoshi-san, non so dove viene tenuto mio marito. {n}Sono sicura che il traditore che mi sta osservando è qui vicino.

Steam (ST): Just talking to him won't solve everything.
Umineko Project (UP): Just talking to him won't solve everything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just talking to him won't solve everything.
PC Japanese (JP): 相談しただけで、万事うまく行くわけがない。
Russian (RU): Простой разговор с ним ничего не решит.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Só falar com ele não vai resolver nada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不可能光商量一下，就萬事順利了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不可能光商量一下，就万事顺利了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Parlare e basta con lui non risolverà niente.

Steam (ST): ...I suspect that Shannon is the traitor, but that's no proof that Gohda and the others aren't.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I suspect that Shannon is an informant, but that doesn't mean that Gohda and the others aren't.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I suspect that Shannon is the traitor, but that's no proof that Gohda and the others aren't.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私は紗音が内通者だと睨んでいるが、ならば、郷田たちがそうでないという保証もない
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……私は紗音が内通者だと睨んでいるが、ならば、郷田たちがそうでないという保証もない。
Russian (RU): ......Я подозреваю, что Шаннон — предатель, но это не доказывает, что Года и остальные таковыми не являются.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu suspeito que a Shannon seja a informante, mas isso não descarta a possibilidade do Gohda e os outros serviçais também serem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……既然我在懷疑紗音是內奸，那麼，鄉田他們也無法保證不是內奸。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……既然我在怀疑纱音是内奸，那么，乡田他们也无法保证不是内奸。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Io sospetto che Shannon sia la traditrice, ma non c'è prova che non lo siano anche Gohda e gli altri.

Steam (ST): ...It's all useless... I guess...leaving here and confessing is too dangerous after all...
Umineko Project (UP): ......It's no good...... Leaving here and confessing is just too dangerous...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......It's all useless...... I guess......leaving here and confessing is too dangerous after all...
PC Japanese (JP): ……駄目だ駄目だ……、やはり、……ここを出て打ち明けるのは危険すぎる…。
Russian (RU): ......Ничего не выйдет...... Думаю...... всё‐таки выходить отсюда и признаваться слишком опасно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Não adianta...... Sair daqui e confessar tudo é muito perigoso...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不行不行……，果然，……從這出去坦白一切太過危險了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不行不行……，果然，……从这出去坦白一切太过危险了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... È tutto inutile... credo che... uscire e confessare sia troppo pericoloso dopotutto...

Steam (ST): Eventually, ...I heard a strange, sobbing voice.
Umineko Project (UP): Eventually, ......I heard a strange, sobbing voice.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Eventually, ......I heard a strange, sobbing voice.
PC Japanese (JP): するとその内、……しゃくり上げるような、おかしな声が聞こえてきた。
Russian (RU): В конце концов...... я услышала странный, рыдающий голос.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eventualmente, ......eu ouvi uma estranha voz soluçante.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不久之後，……像是抽泣的怪聲傳入了耳中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不久之后，……像是抽泣的怪声传入了耳中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Alla fine... sentii una strana voce singhiozzante.

Steam (ST): ...Whose voice was it...?
Umineko Project (UP): ......Whose voice was it......?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Whose voice was it......?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......De quem é essa voz......?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……什麼聲音……？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……什么声音……？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Di chi era...?

Steam (ST): I strained my ears, trying to hear that strange voice, ...and was shocked to discover that it was Hideyoshi weeping...
Umineko Project (UP): I strained my ears, trying to hear that strange voice, .........and was shocked to discover that it was Hideyoshi weeping...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I strained my ears, trying to hear that strange voice, ......and was shocked to discover that it was Hideyoshi weeping...
PC Japanese (JP): 耳を澄まし、そのおかしな音に耳を傾けるとやがて、………それが秀吉の嗚咽であるとわかり、私は呆然とした…。
Russian (RU): Я напрягла слух, пытаясь расслышать странный голос...... и была потрясена, поняв, что это Хидэёши рыдает...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu me concentrei para tentar escutar aquela voz estranha, .........e fiquei chocada ao descobrir que era o Hideyoshi chorando...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 側耳傾聽了一會兒這怪聲後，………當得知那是秀吉的嗚咽哭聲時，我不禁呆住了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 侧耳倾听了一会儿这怪声后，………当得知那是秀吉的呜咽哭声时，我不禁呆住了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tesi le orecchie, provando ad ascoltare quella strana voce... e fui shockata dallo scoprire che era Hideyoshi che piangeva...

Steam (ST): Hideyoshi, ...who had lost his only son, was finally able to shed tears and cry, ...now that he was all alone like this...
Umineko Project (UP): Now that he was all alone like this, Hideyoshi, ......who had lost his only son, was finally able to shed tears and cry...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Hideyoshi, ......who had lost his only son, was finally able to shed tears and cry...now that he was all alone like this...
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉は、……一人息子を失ったことを、こうしてたった一人になることで、ようやく涙を零して泣けるようになったのだ…。
Russian (RU): Хидэёши...... потерявший своего единственного сына, наконец мог пролить слёзы и рыдать... теперь, когда был один...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora que ele estava sozinho, Hideyoshi, ......que havia perdido seu único filho, finalmente foi capaz de derramar suas lágrimas e chorar...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 秀吉，……是通過像這樣一個人待著，才終於得以為失去獨子，流下眼淚…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 秀吉，……是通过像这样一个人待着，才终于得以为失去独子，流下眼泪…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Hideyoshi... che aveva perso il suo unico figlio, poteva finalmente versare lacrime e piangere... ora che era tutto solo in quel modo...

Steam (ST): ...Thinking that he needed to support Eva in her distress, he acted as though he alone was standing firm.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Thinking that he needed to support Eva in her distress, he had acted as though he alone was standing firm.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……取り乱す絵羽を支えなければと、自分だけは気丈を装っていた。
Russian (RU): ......Считая, что ему нужно поддержать Еву в её горе, он старался вести себя стойко.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Acreditando que ele precisava apoiar Eva e sua angústia, ele agiu como se continuasse firme e inabalado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不能不去支撐悲傷過度的繪羽，獨自強裝堅強。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不能不去支撑悲伤过度的绘羽，独自强装坚强。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E pensare che doveva supportare Eva nella sua afflizione, comportandosi come se lui solo stesse rimanendo composto.

Steam (ST): However, he has as good a right to cry as anyone.
Umineko Project (UP): However, he had as good a right as anyone to cry.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, he had as good a right as anyone to cry.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、彼にだって泣く権利も資格もある。
Russian (RU): Но у него, как и у всех, было право выплакаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, ele tem tanto direito de chorar quanto qualquer outro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，他也有哭的權利與資格。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，他也有哭的权利与资格。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, lui aveva il diritto di piangere come tutti.

Steam (ST): ...And now that he's found a place where no one can see his tears, he finally let himself do it...
Umineko Project (UP): ......And now that he had found a place where no one could see his tears, he was finally allowing himself to let it out...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......And now that he had found a place where no one could see his tears, he finally let himself do that...
PC Japanese (JP): ……そして、こうして誰にも涙を見せずに済む場所を得て、ようやくそれを自分に許したのだ…。
Russian (RU): ......И теперь, найдя место, где никто не мог увидеть его слёз, он наконец позволил себе это...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......E agora que ele encontrou um lugar onde ninguém veria suas lágrimas, ele finalmente foi capaz de colocar tudo para fora...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……而像這樣，在得到能不被任何人看到自己眼淚的獨處之所時，他終於允許自己哭了出來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……而像这样，在得到能不被任何人看到自己眼泪的独处之所时，他终于允许自己哭了出来…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E ora che aveva trovato un posto dove nessuno poteva vedere le sue lacrime, finalmente si lasciò andare...

Steam (ST): ......And I've... ...lost my daughter.
Umineko Project (UP): ............I've......lost my daughter too.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........And I've......lost my daughter.
PC Japanese (JP): …………私だって、……娘を失った。
Russian (RU): .........А я...... потеряла дочь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ............Eu também......perdi minha filha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………我也是，……失去了女兒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …………我也是，……失去了女儿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E io ho... perso mia figlia.

Steam (ST): ...I haven't seen her corpse with my own eyes, ...so it still doesn't really feel like she's dead.
Umineko Project (UP): ...I haven't seen her body with my own eyes, ......so it still doesn't really feel like she's dead.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...I haven't seen her corpse with my own eyes, ......so it still doesn't really feel like she's dead.
PC Japanese (JP): …遺体を直接この目で見たわけでないから、……未だに死んだという実感は持てない。
Russian (RU): ...Я не видела её труп своими глазами...... поэтому до сих пор даже не чувствую, что она мертва.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Eu sequer vi seu corpo pessoalmente, ......então ainda não parece que ela realmente morreu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …雖然因為沒有直接親眼見到遺體，……所以還沒切實感受到女兒的死。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …虽然因为没有直接亲眼见到遗体，……所以还没切实感受到女儿的死。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non ho visto il suo cadavere coi miei occhi... quindi mi sento ancora come se non sia morta.

Steam (ST): But if the one who carried her off was the culprit... and he had some repulsive motive for doing it, ...just thinking about it makes it feel as though my chest will tear itself apart...
Umineko Project (UP): But if the one who carried her off was the culprit...and he had some repulsive motive for doing it, ......just thinking about it makes me feel as though my chest will tear itself apart...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But if the one who carried her off was the culprit and he had some repulsive motive for doing it......just thinking about it makes it feel as though my chest will tear itself apart...
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、遺体を運び去ったのが犯人で、何かおぞましい目的のためにだとしたら、……考えるだけで、胸が張り裂けそうだった…。
Russian (RU): Но если её унёс преступник, у которого был отталкивающий мотив...... От одного этого моя грудь словно разрывается на части...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas se quem sumiu com seu corpo foi o culpado...e ele possui algum motivo repulsivo para fazer isso, ......só de pensar sobre isso já faz com que eu sinta uma dor no peito, como se ele estivesse sendo aberto...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，如果將遺體搬走的是犯人，是出於什麼齷齪的目的的話，……光是這麼想想，我就感到心都要被撕碎了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，如果将遗体搬走的是犯人，是出于什么龌龊的目的的话，……光是这么想想，我就感到心都要被撕碎了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma se quello che l'ha portata via è il colpevole e aveva qualche motivo ripugnante per farlo... solo pensarci mi fa sentire come se mi esplodesse il petto...

Steam (ST): The reason I'm hiding in here now...is that I'm thinking more about my still-living husband than my dead daughter.
Umineko Project (UP): The reason I'm hiding in here now is that I'm thinking more about my still living husband than my dead daughter.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The reason I'm hiding in here now is that I'm thinking more about my still living husband than my dead daughter.
PC Japanese (JP): 死んだ娘より、今はまだ生きてる夫のことを考え、こうして息を潜めている。
Russian (RU): Я прячусь здесь потому, что больше думаю о живом муже, нежели о мёртвой дочери.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O motivo pelo qual estou escondida aqui agora é porque eu penso mais no meu marido, que ainda está vivo, do que na minha falecida filha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 比起死去的女兒，此刻還活著的丈夫才應放在心上，正因如此想著，所以我才像這樣壓低呼吸地躲著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 比起死去的女儿，此刻还活着的丈夫才应放在心上，正因如此想着，所以我才像这样压低呼吸地躲着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La ragione per cui mi sto nascondendo qui ora è che sto pensando più a mio marito ancora vivo che non a mia figlia morta.

Steam (ST): ...But if I were given the chance, ...I'd be wailing at the top of my lungs too.
Umineko Project (UP): ......But if I were given the chance, ...I'd be wailing at the top of my lungs too.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "What happened to the other corpses?! The culprit carried them off somewhere, right?! It may be that the culprit isn't satisfied with just killing, but intends to do something with the corpses...!! So no way! No way we're leaving my husband all alone here!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "What happened to the other corpses when we did that?! The culprit carried them off somewhere! It may be that the culprit isn't satisfied with just killing, but intends to do something with the bodies as well...!! So no way! No way we're leaving my husband all alone here!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "What happened to the other corpses?! The culprit carried them off somewhere, right?! It may be that the culprit isn't satisfied with just killing, but intends to do something with the corpses...!! So no way! No way we're leaving my husband all alone here!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「譲治たちの死体はそうしたらどうなったの？！　犯人にどこかへ持っていかれちゃったのよ？！　犯人は、殺すだけじゃ飽き足らず、遺体にまで何か無体なことをするつもりなのかもしれない…！！だから駄目ッ！　ここへ主人をひとりぼっちで残していくなんて絶対駄目！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「譲治たちの死体はそうしたらどうなったの？！　犯人にどこかへ持っていかれちゃったのよ？！　犯人は、殺すだけじゃ飽き足らず、遺体にまで何か無体なことをするつもりなのかもしれない…！！　だから駄目ッ！　ここへ主人をひとりぼっちで残していくなんて絶対駄目！！」
Russian (RU): "Что случилось с другими трупами?! Преступник унёс их куда‐то, верно?! Может, ему мало одного убийства, и он намеревается что‐то сделать с трупами!.. Поэтому — нет! Мы ни в коем случае не оставим моего мужа здесь одного!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "E o que aconteceu com os outros corpos quando fizemos isso?! O culpado sumiu com eles! Talvez o culpado não esteja satisfeito em só matar, e pretende fazer algo com os corpos...!! Não vou deixar aqui! Sem chance que vou deixar meu marido sozinho aqui!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「讓治他們的屍體就是這麼辦的，然後怎麼了？！被犯人不知帶到什麼地方去了喲？！犯人是光殺還不滿足，甚至還要對遺體都做些什麼沒人性的事也說不定…！！所以不行！絕對不能，讓我家主人一個人留在這裡！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「让治他们的尸体就是这么办的，然后怎么了？！被犯人不知带到什么地方去了哟？！犯人是光杀还不满足，甚至还要对遗体都做些什么没人性的事也说不定…！！所以不行！绝对不能，让我家主人一个人留在这里！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Che cosa è successo agli altri cadaveri?! Il colpevole li ha portati da qualche parte, giusto?! Può essere che lui non sia soddisfatto solo con l'uccidere, ma intende fare qualcosa con i cadaveri...!! Quindi assolutamente no! {n}Non lasceremo mio marito tutto solo qui!!"

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 此話若是屬實，光是這幾秒的時間，對她來說就已經足夠了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 此话若是属实，光是这几秒的时间，对她来说就已经足够了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se ciò era vero, quei pochi secondi erano più che sufficienti per lei.

Steam (ST): Later on, she could sip black tea in the parlor while perusing the photograph of the scene inside her memory, playing the part of an armchair detective...
Umineko Project (UP): Later on, she could sip black tea in the parlor while perusing her mental photographs of the crime scene, and enjoy playing the part of the armchair detective...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Later on, she could sip black tea in the parlor while perusing the photograph of the scene inside her memory, playing the part of an armchair detective...
PC Japanese (JP): あとは客間でのんびり、記憶という名の現場写真を眺めながら、紅茶を傾けて、安楽椅子探偵を洒落込めばいい…。
Russian (RU): Позже она сможет за чёрным чаем в гостиной просматривать фотографии этой сцены в своей памяти, играя роль кабинетного детектива...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mais tarde, ela poderia saborear um chá preto na sala de visitas e perscrutar suas fotografias mentais da cena do crime, se divertindo enquanto performa sua investigação de detetive de poltrona...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接下來就只用在客廳裡悠然自得，邊看著名為記憶的現場照片，邊品著紅茶，派頭十足地當安樂椅神探就行了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接下来就只用在客厅里悠然自得，边看着名为记忆的现场照片，边品着红茶，派头十足地当安乐椅神探就行了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In seguito, avrebbe sorseggiato the nero nel salotto mentre sfogliava mentalmente la fotografia della scena nella sua memoria, svolgendo il ruolo di un detective in poltrona...

Steam (ST): Then, suddenly, her eyes stopped on the closet off to the side.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, suddenly, her eyes stopped on the closet off to the side.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, suddenly, her eyes stopped on the closet off to the side.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、ふと、脇のクローゼットに目を留める。
Russian (RU): Вдруг её взгляд остановился на шкафу в стороне.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, subitamente, seus olhos pararam no armário fechado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪梨花的目光，忽然，停在了邊上的壁櫥上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘梨花的目光，忽然，停在了边上的壁橱上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi, improvvisamente, i suoi occhi si fermarono sull'armadio di lato.

Steam (ST): ...A closet for hanging overcoats.
Umineko Project (UP): ......A closet for hanging overcoats.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……外套を掛けるクローゼット。
Russian (RU): ......На шкафу для пальто.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Um armário para pendurar casacos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……那是用於掛外套的壁櫥。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……那是用于挂外套的壁橱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Un armadio per appendere i cappotti.

Steam (ST): If it was large enough to fit a coat on a hanger, ......a person should be able to hide in it.........
Umineko Project (UP): If it was large enough to fit a coat on a hanger, .........a person should be able to hide in it............
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If it was large enough to fit a coat on a hanger, .........a person should be able to hide in it............
PC Japanese (JP): 外套がハンガーに吊るせるほどの大きさなら、………人が隠れることだって出来るはず…………。
Russian (RU): Если он достаточно большой, чтобы в него можно было вешать пальто......... тогда и человек может там спрятаться............
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era grande o bastante para pendurar um casaco, .........uma pessoa poderia se esconder dentro dele............
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然大到了能用衣架掛著外套，………那麼，人也理應能夠藏在裡面…………。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然大到了能用衣架挂着外套，………那么，人也理应能够藏在里面…………。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se era largo abbastanza da far stare un cappotto su una gruccia... una persona sarebbe stata capace di nascondervisi dentro...

Steam (ST): Slowly, ......Erika... ...stretched her hand out towards the closet......
Umineko Project (UP): Slowly, ............Erika......stretched her hand out towards the closet............
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Slowly, ............Erika......stretched her hand out towards the closet............
PC Japanese (JP): ゆっくりと、…………ヱリカは、……クローゼットに手を伸ばす…………。
Russian (RU): Медленно............ Эрика...... протянула руку к шкафу............
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Lentamente, ............Erika......esticou sua mão na direção do armário............
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 慢慢地，…………繪梨花，……將手伸向了壁櫥…………。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 慢慢地，…………绘梨花，……将手伸向了壁橱…………。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lentamente... Erika... allungò le mani verso l'armadio...

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): Erika's shoulder was grabbed roughly from behind.
Umineko Project (UP): Erika's shoulder was grabbed roughly from behind.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 乱暴に、ヱリカの肩が後から掴み寄せられる。
Russian (RU): Сзади её кто‐то грубо схватил за плечо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os ombros de Erika foram segurados por trás.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪梨花的肩膀被人一把抓住，粗暴地硬往後拽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘梨花的肩膀被人一把抓住，粗暴地硬往后拽。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La spalla di Erika fu afferrata bruscamente da dietro.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "...Let's go, Ms. Detective. Didn't you ever learn how to stick together on school field trips?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......Let's go, Ms. Detective. Didn't they teach you to stick with the group on school field trips?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Let's go, Ms. Detective. Didn't you ever learn how to stick together on school field trips?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……行くぜ、探偵さん。団体行動を乱すなって、修学旅行で習わなかったか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……行くぜ、探偵さん。団体行動を乱すなって、修学旅行で習わなかったか」
Russian (RU): "......Пошли, мисс детектив. Или тебя не учили во время школьных поездок не отделяться от группы?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Vamos, Srta. Detective. Não te ensinaram na escola que durante os passeios você deve sempre ficar junto com o grupo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……走啦，偵探小姐。修學旅行時，沒學過別給團體行動搗亂嘛？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……走啦，侦探小姐。修学旅行时，没学过别给团体行动捣乱嘛？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Andiamo, Ms. Detective. Non hai mai imparato nelle gite scolastiche come si rimane uniti insieme?"

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "Well, whenever I go traveling, someone always dies."
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, whenever I go traveling, someone always dies."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「私が旅行に行くと、必ず人が死ぬってお約束がありまして。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私が旅行に行くと、必ず人が死ぬってお約束がありまして」
Russian (RU): "Ну, когда я путешествую, кто‐нибудь всегда умирает."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, sempre que saio para viajar, alguém acaba morrendo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我出去旅行，是有著必會死人的慣例的哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我出去旅行，是有着必会死人的惯例的哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Beh, dovunque viaggiassi, moriva sempre qualcuno."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Hey, what do you think you're doing, brats?! Come quickly...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Hey, what do you think you're doing, brats?! Move it...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hey, what do you think you're doing, brats?! Come quickly...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「おらッ、何してやがるガキども！　早く来い…！！」
Russian (RU): "Эй, вы чего застряли, мелочь?! Давайте быстрее!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ei, o que acham que estão fazendo, pirralhos?! Andando...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喂，在幹嘛呢，小鬼們？！快點過來…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「喂，在干嘛呢，小鬼们？！快点过来…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ehi, che pensate di fare, marmocchi?! Venite subito...!!"

Steam (ST): Rudolf told them to hurry.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf told them to hurry.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫が急かす。
Russian (RU): Рудольф поторопил их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rudolf disse para se apressarem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留弗夫在催他們快走。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫在催他们快走。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rudolf disse loro di sbrigarsi.

Steam (ST): After clicking her tongue and glaring at the closet, Erika followed Battler back to the parlor for the time being...
Umineko Project (UP): After clicking her tongue and glaring at the closet, Erika followed Battler back to the parlor for the time being...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After clicking her tongue and glaring at the closet, Erika followed Battler back to the parlor for the time being...
PC Japanese (JP): ヱリカは舌打ちし、クローゼットを睨み付けた後、戦人に促されながら客間へ一度戻るのだった…。
Russian (RU): Цокнув языком и злобно глянув на шкаф, Эрика до поры до времени последовала за Баттлером обратно в гостиную...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após estalar a língua e olhar na direção do armário, Erika seguiu Battler de volta para a sala de visitas...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪梨花咂了咂嘴，瞪了下壁櫥後，被戰人催著，一同回了客廳…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘梨花咂了咂嘴，瞪了下壁橱后，被战人催着，一同回了客厅…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver schioccato la lingua e aver fissato l'armadio, Erika seguì Battler in salotto per il momento...

Steam (ST): ...The sound of their footsteps finally faded.
Umineko Project (UP): .........The sound of their footsteps finally faded.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......The sound of their footsteps finally faded.
PC Japanese (JP): ………ようやく、ヱリカたちの足音が遠退く。
Russian (RU): ......Их шаги наконец‐то стихли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........O som de seus passos finalmente desapareceram.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………繪梨花等人的腳步聲，終於漸漸遠去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………绘梨花等人的脚步声，终于渐渐远去了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il suono dei loro passi finalmente scomparve.

Steam (ST): That time of terror, when I feared that even the dripping of the cold sweat covering my cheeks might be noticed, had finally...ended.
Umineko Project (UP): That time of terror, when I feared that even the dripping of the cold sweat that covered my cheeks might be noticed, was finally......over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That time of terror, when I feared that even the dripping of the cold sweat that covered my cheeks might be noticed, had finally......ended.
PC Japanese (JP): 頬を伝うほどの冷や汗が滴る音を、聞き取られるのではないかと怯えるほどの恐怖の時間は、ようやく、……終わる。
Russian (RU): Тот ужас, когда я боялась, что они могут услышать даже то, как с моих щёк капает холодный пот, наконец...... прошёл.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O momento de terror, onde temi que uma simples gota de suor que escorria por minha bochecha pingasse e fosse ouvida......chegou ao fim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這段以致於使人提心吊膽地懼怕著，是否會被人聽到從臉頰上滴下冷汗之聲的恐怖的時間，總算是，……結束了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这段以致于使人提心吊胆地惧怕着，是否会被人听到从脸颊上滴下冷汗之声的恐怖的时间，总算是，……结束了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel momento di terrore, quando temevo che persino il rumore di una goccia del sudore freddo che mi copriva le guance potesse venire scoperto, era finalmente... terminato.

Steam (ST): With my hand that still couldn't stop trembling, I slowly opened the closet door and dashed out into the hallway.
Umineko Project (UP): I slowly opened the closet door with hands that still couldn't stop trembling and dashed out into the hallway.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): With my hand that still couldn't stop trembling, I slowly opened the closet door and dashed out into the hallway.
PC Japanese (JP): 私はまだ震えの治まらない手で、ゆっくりとクローゼットを開け、廊下に飛び出す。
Russian (RU): Рукой, до сих пор не переставшей дрожать, я медленно открыла дверцу шкафа и выбежала в коридор.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu abri a porta do armário devagar enquanto minhas mãos tremiam, e sai correndo pelo corredor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我以還未停止顫抖的手，慢慢地打開壁櫥，飛奔到了走廊上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我以还未停止颤抖的手，慢慢地打开壁橱，飞奔到了走廊上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Con la mia mano che non riusciva ancora a smettere di tremare, aprii lentamente la porta dell'armadio e uscii, scattando verso il corridoio.

Steam (ST): It's okay, no one's found me... Still, it's a good thing they didn't lock the door...
Umineko Project (UP): It's alright, no one's found me......{n}Still, it's a good thing they didn't lock the door...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It's alright, no one's found me...... Still, it's a good thing they didn't lock the door...
PC Japanese (JP): 大丈夫、誰にも見られてない……。それにしても、鍵を掛けられなくてよかった…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 大丈夫、誰にも見られてない……。{n}それにしても、鍵を掛けられなくてよかった…。
Russian (RU): Всё в порядке, меня никто не нашёл......{n}Но как же хорошо, что они не заперли дверь...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Está tudo bem, ninguém me descobriu......{n}Ainda assim, é bom que não tenham trancado a porta...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 沒事，沒有被任何人看到……。{n}還有，他們沒鎖門真是太好了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 没事，没有被任何人看到……。{n}还有，他们没锁门真是太好了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Va tutto bene, non mi ha visto nessuno... eppure, è stato un colpo di fortuna che non abbiano chiuso la porta a chiave...

Steam (ST): If they had, I wouldn't be able to lock it behind me after I left, and they'd find that suspicious...
Umineko Project (UP): If they had, I wouldn't be able to lock behind me after I left, and they'd find that suspicious...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If they had, I wouldn't be able to lock behind me after I left, and they'd find that suspicious...
PC Japanese (JP): もしも掛けられていたら、こうして部屋を出た後に施錠できなくて、彼らを不審がらせるところだった…。
Russian (RU): Иначе я бы не смогла запереть её после ухода, что они сочли бы подозрительным...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eles tivessem feito isso, eu não conseguiria fechar depois de sair, e acabariam suspeitando disso...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果鎖了的話，像這麼跑出房間後就沒法重新鎖好了，而且還會令他們起疑…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果锁了的话，像这么跑出房间后就没法重新锁好了，而且还会令他们起疑…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se l'avessero fatto, ora non riuscirei a chiuderla dopo essermene andata, e lo troverebbero sospetto...

Steam (ST): Anyway, I should leave this place.
Umineko Project (UP): Anyway, I should leave this place.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Anyway, I should leave this place.
PC Japanese (JP): とにかくここを立ち去ろう。
Russian (RU): Так или иначе, нужно уходить отсюда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De qualquer forma, eu preciso deixar este lugar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 總之，趕快離開此處。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 总之，赶快离开此处。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Comunque, dovrei lasciare questo posto.

Steam (ST): Then I'll return to my room and pretend that I was sleeping the whole time...
Umineko Project (UP): Then I'll return to my room and pretend that I was sleeping the whole time...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then I'll return to my room and pretend that I was sleeping the whole time...
PC Japanese (JP): そして自室に戻り、ついさっきまで寝ていたということにしよう…。
Russian (RU): Вернусь в свою комнату и сделаю вид, что всё это время спала...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Retornarei para o meu quarto e irei fingir que estive dormindo o tempo todo...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後回自己的房間，裝做剛才一直在睡覺…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后回自己的房间，装做刚才一直在睡觉…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi tornerò nella mia stanza e farò finta di aver dormito per tutto il tempo...

Steam (ST): Yes, if I don't get back soon...
Umineko Project (UP): That's right, I have to get back quickly...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Yes, if I don't get back soon...
PC Japanese (JP): そうだ、早く戻らなければ…。
Russian (RU): Да, если я скорее не вернусь...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso mesmo, preciso voltar de uma vez...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對，我得趕快回去…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对，我得赶快回去…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Già, se non torno presto...

Steam (ST): A new murder has occurred. They'll probably try to tell me about it.
Umineko Project (UP): A new murder has occurred.{n}They'll probably try to tell me about it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A new murder has occurred. They'll probably try to tell me about it.
PC Japanese (JP): 新しい殺人が起こったのだ。私にも知らせようとするだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 新しい殺人が起こったのだ。{n}私にも知らせようとするだろう。
Russian (RU): Произошло новое убийство.{n}Они наверняка попробуют рассказать мне об этом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aconteceu mais um assassinato.{n}Eles provavelmente vão tentar me avisar sobre isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 發生了新的凶殺。{n}他們將會來通知我吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 发生了新的凶杀。{n}他们将会来通知我吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È stato compiuto un nuovo omicidio. Probabilmente cercheranno di dirmelo.

Steam (ST): And they'll probably do it shortly after they carry Hideyoshi-san's corpse back to the parlor.
Umineko Project (UP): And they'll probably do it immediately after they carry Hideyoshi‐san's body back to the parlor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And they'll probably do it shortly after they carry Hideyoshi-san's corpse back to the parlor.
PC Japanese (JP): きっと、秀吉さんの遺体を客間に運び、ひと段落したならすぐに。
Russian (RU): Наверное, вскоре после того, как отнесут труп Хидэёши в гостиную.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E provavelmente vão fazer isso assim que levarem o corpo do Hideyoshi‐san para a sala de visitas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們一定會在“把秀吉的遺體搬到客廳”之事暫告一段落後，馬上就來通知我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们一定会在“把秀吉的遗体搬到客厅”之事暂告一段落后，马上就来通知我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E probabilmente lo faranno poco dopo aver portato il cadavere di Hideyoshi nel salotto.

Steam (ST): I can get around a phone call by saying I was asleep and didn't notice, but if they come knocking directly, that'll be bad...
Umineko Project (UP): I can get around a phone call by saying I was asleep and didn't notice, but if they come knocking directly, that'll be bad...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I can get around a phone call by saying I was asleep and didn't notice, but if they come knocking directly, that'll be bad...
PC Japanese (JP): 電話なら、寝ていて気付かなかったともいい訳できるが、直接ノックされたらまずい…。
Russian (RU): Я могу обойти телефонный звонок, сказав, что спала и не слышала, но если они напрямую постучат в дверь, будет плохо...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu posso dizer que estava dormindo e não ouvi a ligação, mas terei problemas se eles forem bater diretamente na porta...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 電話的話，還能以“睡著了沒注意到”為借口，但要是直接來敲門就糟了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 电话的话，还能以“睡着了没注意到”为借口，但要是直接来敲门就糟了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Posso giustificare il non aver sentito una chiamata dal telefono dicendo che stavo dormendo e non me ne sono accorta, ma se hanno bussato la porta, sarà grave...

Steam (ST): I have to get back quickly, before they try to force their way in...
Umineko Project (UP): I have to get back quickly, before they try to force their way in......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I have to get back quickly, before they try to force their way in......
PC Japanese (JP): 部屋に押し掛けて来る前に、早く戻らなければ……。
Russian (RU): Нужно вернуться до того, как они надумают ломать дверь......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Preciso voltar logo, antes que eles tentem entrar......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 得在他們來我房間前，趕快回去……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 得在他们来我房间前，赶快回去……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Devo tornare presto, prima che provino ad intrudersi nella stanza...

Steam (ST): I don't know whether I should run all out noisily, hide my footsteps and walk in secret, or walk around normally as though nothing has happened...!
Umineko Project (UP): I don't even know whether I should sprint back noisily to save every second I can, sneak back with hushed footsteps, or walk around normally as though I don't know anything has happened......!

Steam (ST): And most importantly, I'm not under suspicion yet.
Umineko Project (UP): And most importantly, I'm not under suspicion yet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And most importantly, I'm not under suspicion yet.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E cosa più importante, non sono ancora sospettata.

Umineko Project (UP): ......I'll tell the police everything. I'll have to endure until then.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu irei contar tudo à polícia. Preciso resistir até lá.

Umineko Project (UP): I'm sure one of the servants is feeding information to the culprit.

Steam (ST): Even in a situation like this, if I mention my husband being held hostage, the culprit will hear...and might use it as an excuse to kill him...
Umineko Project (UP): Even in a situation like this, if I talk about my husband being a hostage, the culprit will hear, and it might be used as an excuse to kill him......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even in a situation like this, if I talk about my husband being a hostage, the culprit will hear, and it might be used as an excuse to kill him......
PC Japanese (JP): このような状況であっても、私が夫を人質に取られていることを話せば、それは犯人の耳に入り、夫を殺す口実にされてしまうかもしれない……。
Russian (RU): Даже в такой ситуации, если я расскажу, что мой муж в заложниках, преступник узнает, и у него появится повод убить его......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo em uma situação como essa, se eu disser que o meu marido está sendo mantido como refém, vai acabar chegado aos ouvidos do culpado, e ele pode usar isso como desculpa para matá‐lo......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 即便在這種狀況下也是，只要我一說“夫君被綁架為人質”，這些話就有可能傳入犯人的耳中，成為犯人殺害我丈夫的理由……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 即便在这种状况下也是，只要我一说“夫君被绑架为人质”，这些话就有可能传入犯人的耳中，成为犯人杀害我丈夫的理由……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Persino in una situazione simile, se parlo del fatto che mio marito è tenuto in ostaggio, il colpevole sentirà, e potrebbe essere utilizzata come scusa per ucciderlo...

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "Natsuhi-san has just come back. Now that we're all here, I have something very important to discuss with you all."
Umineko Project (UP): "Natsuhi‐san has just come back. Now that we're all here, I have something very important to discuss with you all."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Natsuhi-san has just come back. Now that we're all here, I have something very important to discuss with you all."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ちょうど、夏妃さんが戻って来てくれました。全員が揃ったところで、私から皆さんに、とても重要な話があります。」

Russian (RU): "Нацухи вернулась. Раз все в сборе, я хочу обсудить со всеми вами нечто очень важное."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「正好，夏妃女士回来了。趁着全体集合，我有非常重要的话，要对大家讲。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "...Something very important...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......Something very important......?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
Russian (RU): ".......Нечто очень важное?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Algo muito importante......?"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Qualcosa di molto importante...?"

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "Yes, it's very important. ...I'd like to lay out everything in front of you all, starting with the first crime."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, it's very important. ......Here in front of you all, I would like to set out the facts of everything that's happened, from the first crime to the last."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yes, it's very important. ......I'd like to lay out everything in front of you all, starting with the first crime."
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇ、重要な話です。……最初の事件からを全て、皆さんの前で整理したいと思います。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ、重要な話です。……最初の事件からを全て、皆さんの前で整理したいと思います」
Russian (RU): "Да, очень. ......Я бы хотела выложить всё, начиная с первого преступления."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, é muito importante. ......Na frente de todos que aqui estão, eu gostaria de expor os fatos de tudo o que aconteceu, do primeiro ao último crime."
