Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是的，重要的话哦。……我想在你们面前整理从第一起事件开始的所有事。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì, è davvero importante. ... Vorrei disporre tutto di fronte a tutti voi, iniziando dal primo crimine."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Then please do that with just the others. I think we should leave that sort of thing to the police. I'm not interested."
Umineko Project (UP): "Then you can leave me out of it, if you please. I think we should leave that sort of thing to the police. I'm not interested."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Then please do that with just the others. I think we should leave that sort of thing to the police. I'm not interested."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それなら、他の皆さんとなさって下さい。私は、そういうことは警察に任せるべきと思っています。関心がありません。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それなら、他の皆さんとなさって下さい。私は、そういうことは警察に任せるべきと思っています。関心がありません」
Russian (RU): "Тогда делайте это без меня. Я считаю, что нужно оставить такие дела полиции. Мне всё равно."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Então vou pedir para que me deixe fora disso. Eu acredito que devemos deixar esse tipo de coisa para a polícia. Não estou interessada."

Speaker: Furudo Erika
Steam (ST): "Since I have it all laid out, this is a very important thing to discuss. Neither you nor anyone else has the right to refuse."
Umineko Project (UP): "I have something very important to say once I've cleared everything up. Neither you nor anyone else has the right to refuse."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「整理した上で、重要なお話があるのです。あなたにも誰にも、断る権利はありません」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「在整理完后，将有很重要的事要说。你和任何人都没有拒绝的权利。」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sapevi che il conflitto chiamato Purgatorio, che risiede nell'intervallo tra Paradiso e inferno, è talvolta più tortuoso dell'inferno stesso...?

Steam (ST): On the gates of hell, it is written that you must abandon all hope.
Umineko Project (UP): On the gates of hell, it is written that you must abandon all hope.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 地獄の門には、望みを一切捨てよと書いてある。
Russian (RU): На вратах ада написано, что нужно отбросить всякую надежду.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na Portão do Inferno está escrito que você deve abandonar toda e qualquer esperança.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 地獄之門上寫著，請捨棄一切希望。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 地狱之门上写着，请舍弃一切希望。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sulle porte dell'inferno, vi è scritto che si deve abbandonare ogni speranza.

Steam (ST): ...A human without hope can accept their suffering and give up.
Umineko Project (UP): ......A human without hope can accept their suffering and give up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……望みを捨てた人間は、苦難を受け入れることで、諦めることもまた出来るのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Человек без надежды может принять свои страдания и смириться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Um humano sem esperança é capaz de aceitar seu sofrimento e desistir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……捨棄了希望的人，通過接受苦難，將能做到死心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……舍弃了希望的人，通过接受苦难，将能做到死心。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Un umano senza speranza può accettare la sua sofferenza e arrendersi.

Steam (ST): However, the residents of Purgatory have hope. A hope of possibly reaching heaven, a hope that cannot be abandoned.
Umineko Project (UP): However, the denizens of Purgatory have hope.{n}A hope of possibly reaching heaven, a hope that cannot be abandoned.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, the residents of Purgatory have hope. A hope of possibly reaching heaven, a hope that cannot be abandoned.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、煉獄の住人には、望みがある。天国に至れるかもしれないという、捨てきれぬ望みがある。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、煉獄の住人には、望みがある。{n}天国に至れるかもしれないという、捨てきれぬ望みがある。
Russian (RU): Но у обитателей чистилища есть надежда.{n}Надежда попасть на небеса, от которой они не могут отказаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, os residentes do Purgatório possuem esperança.{n}Uma esperança de alcançar o Céu; uma esperança que não pode ser abandonada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，煉獄的住民，卻心中還有希望。{n}有著“說不定能升入天國”的，沒法扔乾淨的希望。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，炼狱的住民，却心中还有希望。{n}有着“说不定能升入天国”的，没法扔干净的希望。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma i residenti del Purgatorio hanno speranza. La speranza di raggiungere il Paradiso, una speranza che non può essere abbandonata.

Steam (ST): And it tortures them.
Umineko Project (UP): And that tortures them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And that tortures them.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、苛む。
Russian (RU): И это пытка для них.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E que os tortura.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，折磨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E ciò li tortura.

Steam (ST): Even in the depths of hell, ...no greater torture device exists than the single pin known as hope...
Umineko Project (UP): Even in the depths of hell, ...no greater torture device exists than the single pin known as hope......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even in the depths of hell, ...no greater torture device exists than the single pin known as hope......
PC Japanese (JP): 希望という名の一本の針に勝る拷問道具は、…地獄にさえ存在しないのだから……。
Russian (RU): Даже в самых глубинах ада... нет пытки хуже, чем единственная зацепка, называемая надеждой......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo nas profundezas do Inferno, ...não existe meio de tortura maior do que uma única agulha conhecida como esperança......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟，就連地獄都不存在，…比這根名為希望的針，更為折磨人的刑具……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟，就连地狱都不存在，…比这根名为希望的针，更为折磨人的刑具……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché persino nelle profondità dell'inferno... non esiste uno strumento di tortura maggiore che lo spillo conosciuto come speranza...

Speaker: {f:5:Virgilia}
Steam (ST): "Fly. Fly from the cliffs of Purgatory. ...Take with you the regrets caused by your fleeting, fragile, foolish hopes and open up Pandora's box. Are you scared? Scared of opening the box?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Leap. Leap from the cliff of Purgatory. ......Cast open Pandora's box, and cast aside your fleeting, fragile, foolish hope and all the longing it brings. You're afraid, aren't you? Of opening the box."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Fly. Fly from the cliffs of Purgatory. ......Take with you the regrets caused by your fleeting, fragile, foolish hopes and open up Pandora's box. Are you scared? Scared of opening the box?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「飛びなさい。煉獄の崖より。……淡く脆くて下らない希望の未練ごと、パンドラの箱を開け放ってしまいなさい。怖いでしょう？　箱を開けるのは。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「飛びなさい。煉獄の崖より。……淡く脆くて下らない希望の未練ごと、パンドラの箱を開け放ってしまいなさい。怖いでしょう？　箱を開けるのは」
Russian (RU): "Улети. Улети со скал чистилища. ......Забери с собой сожаления, вызванные твоими мимолётными, хрупкими, глупыми надеждами, и открой ящик Пандоры. Ты боишься? Боишься открыть его?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Salte. Salte e voe do penhasco do Purgatório. ......Abra a Caixa de Pandora, deixe de lado sua efêmera, frágil e tola esperança junto de toda ânsia que isto traz. Está com medo, não está? Com medo de abrir a caixa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「跳下去吧。從煉獄的懸崖跳下去。……將那淡淡的脆弱的無聊的對於希望的眷戀，隨著打開潘多拉之箱一同放出吧。很怕嗎？打開那箱子。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「跳下去吧。从炼狱的悬崖跳下去。……将那淡淡的脆弱的无聊的对于希望的眷恋，随着打开潘多拉之箱一同放出吧。很怕吗？打开那箱子。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Vola. Vola dalla rupe del Purgatorio. ... Porta con te i rimorsi causati dalle tue effimere, fragili, folli speranze e apri la scatola di Pandora. Sei spaventata? {n}Hai paura di aprire la scatola?"

Steam (ST): Beato was silent, ......but with a single tear, she nodded slightly.
Umineko Project (UP): Beato was silent, .........but with a single tear, she nodded slightly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトは無言だったが、………一粒の涙を浮かべながら、小さく頷いた。
Russian (RU): Беато молчала......... но, пролив единственную слезу, она слегка кивнула.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beato estava em silêncio, .........mas com uma singela lágrima, ela assentiu suavemente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵雖然沒說話，………但她邊流下一滴眼淚，邊微微地點了點頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵虽然没说话，………但她边流下一滴眼泪，边微微地点了点头。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beato era silenziosa... ma con una singola lacrima, annuì di poco.

Speaker: {f:5:Virgilia}
Steam (ST): "Is the cat in the box alive or dead? The time has now come...to check. ...If the cat is dead, quickly hold a funeral for it and have it rise to heaven. If the cat is alive, quickly feed it and give it all of your affection.
Umineko Project (UP): "Is the cat in the box alive or dead? The time has now come...to check. ......If the cat is dead, hold a funeral for it quickly and have it rise to heaven. If the cat is alive, feed it quickly and give it all of your affection."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Is the cat in the box alive or dead? The time has now come...to check. ......If the cat is dead, quickly hold a funeral for it and have it rise to heaven. If the cat is alive, quickly feed it and give it all of your affection.
PC Japanese (JP): 「箱の中の猫は生きているのか、死んでいるのか。それを確かめる時が、来ました。……死んでいる猫ならば、早く供養して、天へ登ってもらいなさい。生きている猫ならば、早く餌を与えて、全ての愛情を注いであげなさい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「箱の中の猫は生きているのか、死んでいるのか。それを確かめる時が、来ました。……死んでいる猫ならば、早く供養して、天へ昇ってもらいなさい。生きている猫ならば、早く餌を与えて、全ての愛情を注いであげなさい」
Russian (RU): "Кошка в коробке жива или мертва? Пришло время... проверить. ......Если кошка умерла, нужно скорее похоронить её и дать ей уйти на небеса. Если жива — надо быстро накормить её и показать, как сильно ты её любишь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O gato dentro da caixa está vivo ou está morto? A hora de confirmarmos isso...chegou. ......Se o gato estiver morto, faça um funeral para ele e o envie logo para o Céu. Se o gato estiver vivo, alimente‐o logo e dê a ele todo o seu afeto."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「箱中貓，是生是死。確認此的時候，已經到來。……是死貓的話，就速速為它上供，使其靈魂得以升天。是活貓的話，就快點給它餵食，傾注進全部的愛情。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「箱中猫，是生是死。确认此的时候，已经到来。……是死猫的话，就速速为它上供，使其灵魂得以升天。是活猫的话，就快点给它喂食，倾注进全部的爱情。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Il gatto nella scatola è vivo o morto? È arrivato il momento... di controllare. ... Se il gatto è morto, esegui subito il suo funerale e fallo salire al Paradiso. {n}Se è vivo, dagli subito da mangiare e prestagli tutto il tuo affetto.

Speaker: {f:5:Virgilia}
Steam (ST): Whether it is alive or dead, your cat box eternally desecrates the cat. ......The key to the box that you were afraid to open...has been brought to you by those two."
Umineko Project (UP): "Whether it is alive or dead, your cat box eternally desecrates the cat. .........Those two have brought you the key to the box that you were too afraid to open."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Whether it is alive or dead, your cat box eternally desecrates the cat. .........The key to the box which you were afraid to open...has been brought to you by those two people."
PC Japanese (JP): 生き死にに関係なく。あなたの猫箱は、猫を永遠に冒涜しています。………あなたが開くことを恐れた箱の鍵を、あの二人が持ってきてくれましたよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「生き死にに関係なく。あなたの猫箱は、猫を永遠に冒涜しています。………あなたが開くことを恐れた箱の鍵を、あの二人が持ってきてくれましたよ」
Russian (RU): "Жива она или мертва, твоя кошачья коробка вечно оскверняет кошку. .........Ключ от коробки, которую ты боялась открыть, тебе принесли те двое."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Independente de estar vivo ou morto, sua caixa de gato o profana eternamente. .........Aquelas duas trouxeram a você a chave para abrir a caixa na qual você tanto teme abrir."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「無關生死。你的貓箱，是在永遠地褻瀆著貓。………那兩人已經帶來了，你害怕打開的箱子的鑰匙了喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「无关生死。你的猫箱，是在永远地亵渎着猫。………那两人已经带来了，你害怕打开的箱子的钥匙了哟。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Che sia vivo o morto, la tua scatola lo dissacra in eterno. ... La chiave per la scatola che avevi paura di aprire... ti è stata portata da quelle due persone."

Steam (ST): {f:5:Beatrice}. It's time for you to die now.
Umineko Project (UP): {f:5:Beatrice}.{n}The time has come for you to die.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beatrice. It's time for you to die now.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェ。あなたは、死ぬべき時を迎えたのです。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ベアトリーチェ。{n}あなたは、死ぬべき時を迎えたのです。
Russian (RU): {f:5:Беатриче}.{n}Близится момент твоей смерти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): {f:5:Beatrice}.{n}A hora de morrer chegou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵莉切。{n}你已迎來了，當死之時。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵莉切。{n}你已迎来了，当死之时。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beatrice. Ora è tempo che tu muoia.

Steam (ST): I hope... I hope that your heart is stopped... ...by the hand of the person you desire.
Umineko Project (UP): I hope...that your heart will be stopped......by the hand of the person you desire.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I hope... I hope that your heart is stopped......by the hand of the person you desire.
PC Japanese (JP): 願わくば。あなたの心臓が、あなたの望んだ人の手によって、……止められることを願っています。
Russian (RU): Я надеюсь... Надеюсь, что твоё сердце остановится...... от руки желанного тобой человека.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu espero...que o seu coração pare......pelas mãos da pessoa pelo qual você ânsia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但願。你的心臟，將會在你所願之人，……的手中停跳。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但愿。你的心脏，将会在你所愿之人，……的手中停跳。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Io spero... spero che il tuo cuore venga fermato... dalla mano della persona che tu desideri.
